95b10(1): 'du / kye ga dang / nas kyis du bya ga mgag da pa bu sa 'ang da kya 'das tshun parnam sa pas su thab
96a1(1): tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir rang gi srog yong su gtong par byas pa'o/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzungs shig dang ngas bshad do// de nas dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus grong khyer bar es na rgya'o
96a2(1): po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la myod pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bdel ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang myi bang pos ka pa la dang rtsod pa dang 'thab bzhi drang/ 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang mchom rkun da
96a3(1): mu ge dang nad rnams myed pa dang 'bras sa lu dang / bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug te gnod pa myed cing na ma dkrugs la bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid sbyangs so// rgyal po de yang dag pa dang ldan zhing bsam
96a4(1): ba bzang pa/ bdag la phan dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba bdag nyid che bachos 'dod pa/ skye dgu la byams pa dang / thams na pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba chags pa myed par yongasu gtong ba
96a5(1): matang pa chen mo la gnas pazhen so// de nas de'i phyi shes na tsun mon lan cig kye zhing dga' ya ma 'a dgung byod do// de rtse zhing dgas pa dga' bkur spyon pa las phyi nig na tsun mo de las bu bcas nas san
96a6(1): par gsungs sa pas nyid par bya'o// snyam cu padi pa 'dod pa skyes te/ des rgyal po la gsol to// rgyas pos kyang / sprul bas rnams bkug sems na/ de dag kyis kyab thasems cad mnalags sa zhes gsod
96a7(1): de nas rgyal po des legs par gsungs pa smra ba 'tshal pa'i phyir gser byed pa dang / grobarda la dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang lakhang dag tu bkon na 'on kyang legs pas gsungs pa de rnyed nas ro shigs zla dgu tshang ba dang
96a8(1): bu 'byung / khye'u gzugs pazang zhing ldan sug la mdzes pa mdog pazang gsed kyi kha dog can mgo lo gdugs par bcug pa/ lag pa ring ba 'phrul ba'i dbyes rjeb sA 'gron na snga legs pa/ sbyin pa sug pa
96a9(1): yan lag dang nyin lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de btsas pa'i tshe btsas bsond byas nas khye'u de'i myir ci skad btags par byed de blon po rnams la re khye'u 'di ma tshus pa ni ma du legs pa pa gsungs pa'i tshelnga bas ne
96a10(1): kyis khye d-i kyi me sa gsungs pams nes de des// de'i khyo dgas pang spa pa kyil pa shes btags so// shenas pa sum ma mthams gta nga / dum su
96b1(1): gnyis dang / dri ma khyud pa'i a ma gnyis dang / the ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / ma ma brgyad la brtad nas ma ma brgyad kyis ho ma dang / zho dang ma dang mar gyi nyin khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad pa bzang po tshig gyis
96b2(1): bskyed srings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin skye drag par 'gyur ro// de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yang legs par gsung 'tshal te ma rnyed do// de nas pa shi ba'i 'og tu/ rgyal po btsugs nas blon po rnams la
96b3(1): sgo ba/ yul gi gyo bo dag pas legs par gsungs pa dgongs kyis pa'i legs par gsungs pa nyan thos 'dod pa'i phyir gdung zhi yi chad do// lha'i dbang po rgya byin ni 'og ma sa gshegs pa'i mtho'ang drug ste
96b4(1): de rgyal lo legs ba gsungs pa mtho tha bas yongs pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po lags bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs su zhal ga dang / dpyis
96b5(1): phyi sdug pa zhig tu gyur da nas rgyal po'i mdund tu tshigs su bcad pasmras pa/ legs skyed chos ni spyad par bye// nyes par spyad pa de myi bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rold tu/ chos spyod de la stonang par gyur/ 
96b6(1): de nas rgyal po ya mtshan du gyur da mdas bya'o ste/ gnod sbyin gyis sna sa na/ gsang ba la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gyis mnyan gyisagasungs gsungs// de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la spras pa
96b7(1): gal te bdag ci skad mchi ba bzhin du khyed kyis mdzad na ni de'i 'og tu bdag gyis kyang bka' rtsibs la pa/ bzhin du brgya'o// / rgyal pos spre nga rdzas pa/ bka' bas lad pa rdzi mchis gnod sbyin gyis smras pa// nyin pa
96b8(1): bdun kyi bar du mye rong du song lder gyi shing gyis mye sbar nas/ gas te der bdag nyid mchongs spyod na ni de'i 'og tu khyed bdag gyis tshigs su bcad pa yang bzlas par bgyi'o// rgyal pos de skad thos nas sems dag
96b9(1): bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin de la spras pa de lhur bgyi'o// de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin snyam gyi 'og tu bcug nas yus thams cad du dril sprugs te/ de nas zhag 'dus na rgyal po legs pade gsungs pa mnyand pa'i phyir/ 
96b10(1): kye sa nyid ma chis par na kyis khyod kyi da nas dang cad byung bam tho da pa da di pa gis ces byas so// de nas byang chub se sa dpa kyi na pasems pan t+ta dan pa yongs su du pa
97a1(1): byur ci na sa 'das na nam ma'anapa na yum lag las te/  su gan sbyin ne nas sa kas dus smrab smra nug
97a2(1): spras pa rgyal po chen po ci sar dam bcas pa bzhin du 'jog cing de rgyal po bu thu bo rgyal por dbang bsrung nas blon po rnams dang grong rdal gyi mye rnams dang / yul gyi myi rnams la nye bar bshags te/ skye bo'i tshogs
97a3(1): rnams dbugs phyung nas mye dong du song ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// de'i chos phyir me 'bar nyi ma khrag dog 'dra ba'i dag ma'i gdod// shas ches 'jigs byed nang du mchod par sems des srog phyi 'jig
97a4(1): pa myedamye tong 'di ni bdag kyi bsod nams mthu'i sa rdzing bu rab bza pa btsun dan gyis ni sgoms pa'i chu/ sil ma pad mas gang bad 'gyur yang dag/ byang chub sems drapas de skad ces smras nas/ 
97a5(1): me dong de'i nang du chongs so// mchongs ma thag tu de'i mdong de rdzing bu zhig tu 'gyud do// de nas lnga'i dbang po rgya byin gyis lha dang myi dad par byed pa'i tshe 'phrul med du 'byung ba de mthong nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi spang bar byas

97a7(1): byang chub sems dpa'as tshig su bcad pa de yid la gzung nas// gser gyi glegs bam li bris te// 'dzam bu'i gling thog dag du grong dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khorarod tu bskor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis

97a9(1): slong dag de bas ka 'di ltar bslab par bye // chos la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya mchod par bya'o// chos la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod par byas nas/ brtend te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag
97a10(1): phyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkas pas/ sod nas / dge slong de dag yid rungs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par spyod do//  mgon myed

97b6(1): pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang pa mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang shin tu yun ring du rtags na sa/ sa la ri mo bris ste/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ko'u ta ma bdag la kar sha pa ni lnga brgyas su/

98a2(1): thal phyogs pas kyang gser ga hrul byed te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas de de dag la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag khyed kyis kyang sbyin par bya ba ma yin no zhes bka' ba sul du to// de nus re shig na khyim bdag mgon myed

100b7(1): pos 'dig kyis datho to// su sa tu ma pas zhesanas pa gsus rgyam 'dus pa sarab tu byung ba dang / skyed par rdzogs ni dge slong ni dang pago gyur banas sanas mi den sa bcos pasu / 
101a1(1): kye kun tu rgyar ba pazad la bka' bas 'ad pa// dge slong chur shog 'das par spyad pasrod cig/ de nas de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ stend pa rdzogs pa yang 'di yin la / dge slong kyi
101a2(1): dngos po yang 'di yin no// de ltar tu 'byung nas tshe ldan pa de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ bag yod cing brtun la bcum la gnas te/ gang gyi phyir rigs kyi bu dag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas / gos mtshon can bgos nas/ yang dag pa dang
101a3(1): pa kho nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i tshangs par spyod pa bla myed pa'i mthar thug pa de'i tshe 'am nyid la rab gyi mngon par shes pas mngon gsum du byas nas bsgrubs te/ khong du chud nas bdag gyi skye ba myi zad do// tshangs par spyod
101a4(1): pa ni spyad zin no// bya ba ni byas so 'di nas srid pa gzhan gyi shes so// snyam tu kun shes par gyur da nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag bcom par gyur na te/ sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzangs dgra bcom pa
101a5(1): ba te/ rna da des pa nyams su byanas ni gam tu sems / bdag kyi stonod pa yang yongs su bya na las 'an par thod par tsan/  ma yin gyi
101b1(1): gas zung dang / ded sa bya nas dpa pa 'dis ca kyar byengs pa jus pa dod cags dang thabs pa zhe sang dang ba.u hA/ ti mug dang bas pa/ bye dang / napa dang bya ngan dang / sde sngags don pa dam
101b2(1): sdug bsngal pa dang yid kyi bdel ba dang / 'brug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba na/ bya myi bya myi shes pa'i bdud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i tshe yang ngas ram gyi srog yongs su btam ste/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / grong khyer
101b3(1): ku na'i byed yul rnams gzigs pa las 'jigs pa skyed pa sa bkod pa legs par rab tu nyon la yin la gzungs shig dang / ngas bshad do// dge slong dag son 'byung ba 'das pa'i 'dus na ro'i sul zhig na dri dgas kyi bya'i po rligs
101b4(1): stong phrag yu ma'i 'gro nga dang / ldan pa/ 'khas shi gsal la yid zhug/ pa zhig 'dug pa las ri dgas kyi khyu de rngos pas byar byas nas rgyal po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bcas te/ ri dgas
101b5(1): kyi khye de dag bams ma sdug tu bcug go// de nas rgyas kyo po de 'di sbrul bu sems te/ gal te bdag gyis 'di rnams ma srungs na ni dang du 'di dag brtan myed par 'ong snyam mo// de nas ta lha'i rlo zam khrod cing log tu bkres te
101b6(1): sa du gcag go nas bya mas mam thos byed pa zung she ba zhugs tedabus bu 'do nas byed du ni gas 'di nas sos/ 'i rlung dun pag kyi zhes
102a1(1): ri rigs kyi phrugu rgyab du zhon te chu klung bsgral nas 'gram du bzhag ste/ de ri dgas kyi tshogs de dag rgal zin par mthong nas 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar bdag gis ri dgas 'di rnams dang
102a2(1): ri dgas kyi bla gu 'di srog phangs pa bskyabs te/ phongs pa las skyabs byas pa de bzhin du bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'khor ba'i sbu gu
102a3(1): las thar bar byed par gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi khyu'i gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no// ri dgas rnams ni grong
102a4(1): khyer ku sha'i gyad yul pa 'di rnams yin no// ri dgas phru gu de ni rab bzangs 'di ni kho na yin no// de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab bzang
102a5(1): gis las ci dag bgyis na des mngon sum gyi nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab bzang nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te
102a6(1): pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni thon pa'i phung po
102a7(1): dang khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// 
102a8(1): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo ho khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nabs su ldan pa bde bar gsheT
102b1(1): ba 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA ra na si na ri dgas kyi nag
102b2(1): drang srong smra ba na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpon po mya ngan med ces bya ba thab 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas/ de thar pa la rang dbang yod pa tsam du
102b3(1): 'dzin to// brtson 'grus ma byas so// re shig na yun ring mo zhig lon pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med kyis ljongs su dbyar gnas pa dam bcas so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams
102b4(1): cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs so// dge slong mya ngan med kyang shing mya ngan 'tshang gi drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs so// de nas shing mya ngan 'tshang de la gnas pa'i lha des bcom ldan 'das yang
102b5(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes thos nas ngu zhing 'dug ste/ de ngu ba'i mtshochi ma zags pa mya ngan med kyi lus la bab bo// de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du bltas nas lha du ba de la smras pa/ lha ci'i phyir ngu// lhas rna ga
102b6(1): rgyu pabyin/ bcom ldan 'ams na po rdzogs pa'i sa rgyam da chung 'a su lda nas 'o// de nas kyangang me kyim lha tshwa thos da / gnang du 'og bzhin du med ces byas te/ de yang snyi rje skad dungs
103a1(1): med pa mo ba ldan 'a kyim du ste/ des bcom ldan 'das mamong na dga' bskyes so// dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 'a srung gis gang thos pas dgra bcom pa nyid ma don nun du byed par 'gyur 'de sa du tshas
103a2(1): brdzun pa/ gra co ponyid na sum du byas te/ thog mkhon ci dang ldan du m+b+hi na med yongs su spya na la sa 'du nas/ de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya ma 'od srung yongs su myong nalas 'das so// denasas
103a3(1): med ldan pa myeng med yongs su su ngan las 'das par sogs/ dga' ba ba skyed de/ tshe nga ldan pa 'dis byud par tho pa thams cad ni bdag las brten pa min gyis/ bdag kyang 'di bzhin du sa 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dgas
103a4(1): rdzogs pa'i sang byus 'od srung gis bras no'i khye'u blam 'a bras do'i bye khyod byed bu'i tshe lo grub pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur mi nas lung brtan pa de gzims mal gyi mas zhugs pa
103a5(1): na bdag kyang de'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos tha mar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi snga rol du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ 
103a6(1): de'i tshe de'i dus na lhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di yin no// dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten dang gnas par bya'i// sdig pa'i grogs po dang
103a7(1): sdig pa'i ston dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag 'jog la
103a8(1): zhugs pan/ sems la 'di lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags kyi sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 
103a9(1): sdig pa'i grogs pa dang / ldog pa'i sbyin ni de snya ma lagams nim byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du kun dga' ba khyod 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i zhes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs po dang/ 
103b1(1): dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i byed min gyi/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma yin no zhes ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dge ba shes gnyen dang / dge ba'i
103b2(1): grogs po dang / dge ba'i sten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang / ma 'dres pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin gyis/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang / sdig pa'i sten ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i
103b3(1): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug

103b5(1): phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bas na rnam grangs 'di kho nas khyod kyis 'gyur gis bya ste/ 'di lta / dge pa'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rdzogs po dang / dge ba'i sprin 'dini tshangs par spyod pa ri po dang / ma 'dres pa dang / yongasu rdzogs pa dang /

104a7(1): 'ug tu 'azungs kun tu ba tul ba te/ mye lce cig tu 'bar nas tshis kyang nyams theg pa'i san byin doto/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / myi zad pa dang / cha bA dang yid du myi 'ong ba ma tshogs myong ba dang banang phyin pa yod dang 'tsho

104b1(1): chom ldan 'das pas pa ded mang po// / de'i mi bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas khor bzhi po rnams sa sbrang bu'i sbrang si ma sgrol ba dang // 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no tshig ston te/ 'khor rgya brag su me su

104b4(1): da/ bdu pa bdun ni 'dags kyin du rtswani mams chis sangasasade bdag kyis yin paganor nam 'aso kho na 'ang rkyen gyis bcam de nga kyi smram sos pa byas bzhin du nges

104b8(1): mas kyings ra spyodad pa sanyed par 'dod dam brnyan pa ny+yad bar tshas lags so// menugs kyi bu byegs drub tu nyon pa yid sa zungs zhis dasangs bgad do// sten sa pa kyi bu thon byung babanas pa dus sa mya
106a1(1): pa byin du zin na phyis kyang 'ding 'od bar 'gyur snyam te/ myi sdug pa'i 'gro ba gsum gi g.yang sar gzhol ba thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba'i 'gro ba gnyis bor ma 'phags pa'i lam rnams thag srings pa de sdig pa'i
106a2(1): sems skyed nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la smras pa// dge slong lhung bzed tshur phyin cig pu ram shing gyi khu ba byin mo zhes byas so nyan thos kyis dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'ongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba myi 'jug ste/ 
106a3(1): sdug cing 'phongs la snying rtser bas myi de la phan gdags bya'o snyam nas lhung bzed de byin no// de nas dpyod pa ngan zhing snying la snying rje myed pa des blangs te/ rkog cig tu song nas gcin gyis bkang ste/ steng du bu ram shing gi khu ba 'bru
106a4(1): 'bas bkab nas/ rang sangs rgyas de la phul ba dang / de nas tshong nas des bsams pa nyon mongs pa 'dis sdig pa chen po zhig byas kyis myed do snyam ste/ de'i phyogs cig tu song nas phongs ste song ngo // bcom ldan 'du

106b10(1): yin te// der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lha 'di ces bka' brtsald to// me'u 'gal gyi bu chur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so// khyod dazod galas 'ongs me'u 'gal gyi bus gso lan da
107a1(1): 6/ btsun pa 'dag ni yi dgas kyi nang nga rgyu zhing mami mchibs las slar mchis te/ de bdag gis yi dgas mo lho ni tho tsam sa kha ni khab dmyig tsam ste/ rang gi sgras g.yogs pa// gceng 'ang mchis shing
107a2(1): nyams thag pa 'di skad 'byin te/ sdug sAl drag po dang / myi zad pa dang / cha ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i chod pa mying zhing / mchis pa mthong lags so// yang gsol pa/ lus chen ri po mthon po 'dral la// sa mu dang sgog ma skam
107a3(1): zhing shin tu bstug/ rang kyi sgra ni gding g.yo sa gcing bar mchis/ bcu sgo 'drakhab dmyig 'dra ba ra rab tu ring / de lung phreng ba smra yod pa// rus pa'i khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/ thod pa thogs shing kyi rmad la// du zhing kun tu drus
107a4(1): par bgyid/ bsgres pa dang ni bsgom pa'i sa// dub cing stug sAl dag gis nyend/ nyams thag skad kyang 'byind par bgyid/ sA ka sngal tshor ba nyams su myong ba de'is myi 'jig brten du// rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na des ni sdug
107a5(1): bsngal 'dra ba/ 'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur// ba ldan 'ad kyis bka' sa lan pa// me'u 'gam spyi rigs mo ni sdig byed pa'i las byed byed pa yin/ de'i las kyi rnams nyan par 'dod dam
107a6(1): bdun pas nyan pa rgya la lags so// me'u 'gal gi bu'i nases yang rab tu nyon pa yid la gzungs shig dngas bshad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i rus rab rnam pa nga
107a7(1): 'di nyid la skye dku ma'i rtsemo te khri nub nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa 'del bar gshegs pa 'jig brten de mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo spyar rdzam
107a8(1): blan byed pa sgra dang gyi rnams kyi brtson pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od bsrung zhes bya ba 'dag rten du 'byung ba / slong la byer pa na mi na drang srong smra ba rigs kyi gnas byertenan cing btsun sa 'o// nanas grong byed bar na mi ni dam
107a9(1): dres padag tshan le su pa rgyas byed dngapabyed do// na gams ma ma cin kyi chu ba ste ba pa'i mngang me ste na mes ma nga gnas nas stsas sum gyini zhi 'i ci
107b1(1): byal bu sul byar rtsa datho 'dulamam na thu du sa me pa ma / so
107b2(1): 'ang byis kyang 'ongs par 'gyur ro bsnyam mo// de nas sdig can des TI ga cad/ rtse phyi ma'i phyi sdug pa khyad du ba sad nas// dge' slong de nang du bos te/ sgo bcad nas srung du 'jug go// mang du yang dpyod sde/ dge' slong khyod la bkur
107b3(1): sti ma yin par byas pa 'di yi dgas phyiran chad/ khyim 'dir ma 'od shig ces byas so// de nas ser sna kun tu stend cing bsgoms te/ mang du bya ba des yi dgas su skyes te/ de lta bu'i sdug sngal nyams su myong ngo // me'u 'gal
107b4(1): gyi bu de pas ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag myi myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ ser sna dbang bam brtson par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bskad ces ka las calan nas// tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu dang lha dang / 
107b5(1): ma yin da // da la sring dang / kyi 'ama'i dang sgo kye chen po gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lce mas bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnam
107b6(1): nad phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khorard kyi myi rnams dang / tshong bros rnams dang // ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams
107b7(1): dang / rgya bas ci dang go bye chen po rnams kyis babyung sti byas bla mar byas/ mi tshad byam mchod par byas te lnga dang / smra dang / gnod sbyin dang snam yin dang / nas malang snying dang / myi yum gyi dang / lto byi chen po rnams kyi
107b8(1): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang / na ldan na bza' po dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang // gdan dang bzhun sos dang sman zong rnams rnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal
107b9(1): po'i khab na 'od ma'i 'tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de nas mo'u 'gal gi bu chen po yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang / yi dgas mo sdong dum me reg 'dral/ nang kyi sgras g.yogs paston matsam pa
107b10(1): kha ni khab kyi dbyig cam ste// 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar sa/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mye lo gcig tu 'bar nas tshig kyang nyams zag pa'i skad byin la// skom gis gdungs te sdug sngal drag po dang / myi zad pa/ chub dang / yid du myi 'o nam
107b11(1): myong ba zhas das mthong brgyas kyis su rung da / smon la rnams bskas par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi me cha 'bas pa de'i me snyed kye phyag 'gro ba'i mdapa ma chad 'a'abra ba zhig mthong don mthong nas kyang rje dang ldan pa 'u 'gas kyi
108a1(1): bu chen pos/ de la smras bla kye khyod kyis sdig pa ci zhig byas na// des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal chen po bdag ni bsdig pa byed byed pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom
108a2(1): ldan 'das rnams la don 'di zhus shishA ga ni khyod la bdag gi sras kyi rnam pa ston par 'gyur te// de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa khye'u 'gal gyi bu chen
108a3(1): mchom ldan 'das gas med ma / dro'i ma com ldan 'das nang du 'jog pa zhengs nas 'khor bani 'apo rnams la sA du smad cim bskol pa dang 'dra la'i chos yodang ldan no// rtsom brtson to// 'khor brgya phrag du mas
108a4(1): yong dbang ba rnams myi g.yos par brjo seM tshunan 'das la chos po dang zhes pa no// mchog nyand par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan kyang 'das rnams ni / gsod bo gsung ba/ gnad par gsungs ga tshung shos
108a5(1): khyod 'ongs pa legs so// zhes gsungs pa sngar mdzum pa ma yin te/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chenapo la/ 'di skad ces bka' bsamakhar to// mo'u 'gal gi bu tshung shog khyo 3/ 
108a6(1): da 'jam pa legs so// khyod gzod g.yas 'ongs mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsolan pa/ btsum pA dag ni yi dgas kyi nang du rgyu zhing 'chi ba las slar mchi sate/ der bdag gis ling dgas mo sdong po mye reg 'dra la/ rang gyi g.yos
108a7(1): bste ni ri ra tsam la/ kha ni khab kyi dmyig tsam ste 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ mye lce cig tu 'phar nas cig cing mnyam thag pa'i skad 'byind to// skom gyis gdungs ste/ sdug sAl drag po dang / myi bzad par/ 
108a8(1): tsham dang / yid du myi 'od pa'i tshor ba dang / de mthong pa cam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par gyur pa dang gang rje no chechang 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng du bye stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i 'chang 'bab pa zhig mthong sags so// bcom ldan
108a9(1): 'das kyis bka' bas sa dpa/ mo'u 'gal gi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no// de mas kyi rnam pa mnyan par 'dod dang / bdun pa mnyand par 'chal lags so// so mthu gal 'i bu 'o na megs pa ra rab tu rto
108a10(1): ma yid la zungs shig dang dwa bshad do// me'u 'gal gi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus nu// skal pa bzang po 'di nyid nas skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi 'i thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgral du bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
108b1(1): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig brte mkhyen dus skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na myed pa lha dang kyi rnams kyis bstond pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od bsrung zhes bya ba 'jig brten du 'byung
108b2(1): de grong byed par na mi drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi gnas de na brtend cing bzhugs pa na de dge slong zhig lang du zhugs nas de brlom kyis gdungs ste/ khron pa'i drung du song nas de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa la dag blo
108b3(1): smras pa che zhing ni bdag bsgom gyis gdungs shing chu byid cig ces byas na yo byad la kun tu 'dzind pa des ser sna skyes ste/ dge slong la smras pa// dge slo dag gi bum bsgribs su 'ong gis/ gal te khyed shi na yang chu ma byin no zhes byas so// 
108b4(1): gagan bya rkyen gas bdus na tung bgacan nam mdzang// de nas bu mo meng pa kyad tu bsnyen cing ba sgoms ste mang du byas bya/ de bu glenas/ yi dgas su skyes mas/ yodags su skyes nas/ yidags bu skyes so// de ga bu'i sdug lnga
108b5(1): drag po dang / kyi bzad pa dang / cha ba dang yi du myi 'ong ba'i tshor pa myong zhing 'dug go// / mo'u 'gal gi bu de bas ma/ 'di ltar slab par byas ste/ ser sbyin sA spad par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o zhes mo'u 'gal gi bu khyod kyis de ltar ba/ 
108b6(1): slab par bya'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' mamal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mi 'bral gi bu chen po dang / lha dang / thu dang na snya ma yin nim N+Da' lding dang / phyi'am pa dang / go phye chen po gzhan na kyang mi ngas

108b8(1): skarnams dang / thu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / sna ma yin dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci dang / zho phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sted byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas mchod par byas te/ sA dang glu dang / banod sbyin dang/ 
108b9(1): sngan ying dang / nam yaba'i snying dang / skye sa kyi dngag sgo phyechen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam sa chen po dang ldan pa na batha' dang / danal zas dang / gzims ma dang / gdan dang sun bsos dang / bA
108b10(1): rnams skyes pa nyan thos mtshon cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan man baba'/ shal zas dang / gdan dang / sun sos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas ca
109a1(1): rgyal po'i lab 'od ma'i tshal bya ga land kan rten cing bzhugs so de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi / mu chen po sA trog ma thabs dang / chos gos gsol nas yung zed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu gsod pa snyoms la song nas rgyal po
109a2(1): khab tu gsod pa snyoms byas te/ zan zos nas phyis myi len pa byas te/ spung zed chos gos bzhag nas bya rgod phung po zhig pa der song te phyin nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/ nyin par gnas pa'i phyir zhing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/

109b6(1): smand pas mthun pa'i zas bstand pa nas/ tshod pon zhig 'dug pa ga la 'a / der song ba dang / tshong pon des kyang mthong nas/ dri la phra/ 'phag/ sa pa khyod ci byed/ des smras pa mthun pa'i kha zas 'dod do// de nas chos

109b10(1): thu byas nas/ byin chad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yid dgas rnams su skyes ste/ rtag tu phyis za'i bar 'gyur ro// me'u 'gal gi bu de lta bas na ser sna spangs pa la brjon par bya ste// rnanan pa
110a1(1): nam rgyas som pa dang/ blan pa chen po rnam pa dang / thug ponamapa da bo 'a'adul los kyi lhan pas dang / da pa rnams dang / lharnams dang / kunams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / rnam yin rnams das

110b2(1): sus du byos te/ khyod lada' sa bye zhing drug nadag phyi rgya hrum zo zhes byas so// demang bdas ga she tsa'i thog tu 'di su bu'i yi dgas su skyes so// btsun pa le'u 'gas kyi bu chen 'di pasan 'das cag gi rte rgyal po'il
110b3(1): danam pa dan pa bdag cag gams kyi ma la shes par 'jogs da 'a dris te// sangs rgyam sa ma mogs pa dge 'aslong gi dge 'du pa gos gso nas/ bdag cag gi srung du man gyi rabs 'don pa gsom cig/ 'on pa
110b4(1): bdag cag gi yi dgas kyi skyes gnas nas/ tharan kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bus kyang mi dgas rnams la cang kyi smra ba la khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bus de dag ni te
110b5(1): khye dra rdzun gyin/ sa rgyasas sa sogs pa bye dge' 'dun cigs la kyang sa so// mi dgas rnam sbyin te/ sangs rgyas macom ldan 'das dge slong ga ni 'dun dang ma
110b6(1): pa mgos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang rer shog shig ces byas pa// / nye du nas la yang khyod kyang shog gis dang / nye bu'i rdzas/ stonod byed pa der/ yi dgas de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhes

110b8(1): dang ldan pa mo 'u dgas gi bu chen tha lta'i khyog gis yi dgas de dag bas man/ yul ma ga ta thog bag na yang kyi sAng la// mabar da kyis gling bzhi pa'i bar du ltas na yang de na sang gyi snang ngo // de nas ci sring
110b9(1): 'ab mishes bya yong 'jug pa bang du rtsub kyang rin par bye snang // de nam che dang nga yo lags gi na pa kyi ga' bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyi tha na ma gyings dngan
110b10(1): gcos ldan 'das kyis 'gar sa ya pa/  bags kyi bu mthong khyed kyi dgas pa byed cig/ nyan thos dang rang mang su thams cad kyi las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs segs cad pas 'das
111a1(1): can pas kyang mi dgas 'khong pa 'dod ldanas gan kyang zhid so ltas te 'acas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyinas mi dgas rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das nyan pas
111a2(1): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol par mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas su sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bgos gsol zhing 'od do// 
111a3(1): sa tu pa sa par gyur pa/ des su du 'phrul bsasadenas 'ac+doMs ldan 'das kyis gsung yan sa dang dran mas ldan gyi ba'i gsungs ma// byin pa na
111a4(1): bsod nams gang / de ni yi dgas kyi bzhin bsod yi dgas 'jig brten rab 'jigs yas// de dag rgyang myung tu sa par 'gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas bcom
111a5(1): ldan 'das kyis gzhi de la rten te/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bsnyend te/ de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag tu mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan
111a6(1): 'das la sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu na gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzangs por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am bu mos skyes nas ring po ma lon par ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum bskyed
111a7(1): par 'gyur te/ gang nas ga pos gang tu skyesa'o// las gang gis skye snyam mo// de nas yi dgas/ sas gi bros pa dang / gsum bcu rtsa/ gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang khor skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems
111a8(1): dga' par 'gyun pa de sa mamag denapa 'ad sa dgas su na pa'i ga'i bu de dag pa na sus na 'i seMs so// byad pan smon 'ayod thom na 'dus na pa ma ma yo 'ad pan gyi ma da
111b1(1): bdag cagasag mngon par bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir dong sam mo// de nas sngon yo dgas su gyur ba'i lha'i bun cha gdub 'khor dag cag 'phrul bar thogs/ sus dogs dang sa mo nos brgyan pa
111b2(1): nor du ga tshogs kyis sbas pa'i bcod pa na sus sur sras dang / tam pa'i spos dang / sI ka las bsogs pas zhugs pa de rnams kyisade nyid kyi mtshan mo sgra'i me tog su pa la dang bad sa dang ku su dang / 
111b3(1): khad ma dkar po dang / san d+ha ra rnams kyis zhu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa khor mkhor yug chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor da te/ chos mnyan
111b4(1): ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan pa rjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dgas gyurd pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsas pa dang / bag mnyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su dran nas
111b5(1): de dang 'dun pasams 'batod te/ debasanas can minas sa 'gyungs pa'i sa'i bu de dag gis kya par chen ma bcas/ de dag rtsod kyi lo// byin pa 'di tu kyad / chos na
111b6(1): na gsum thong ba byas napa de nyin tu byi 'ang bar gyu to//  de bcas can 'das kyis ma dang ldan pa rtsa tsa lag ni/ ke bu chen po sa ka' bsas dpa/ su nas pa khyo gyi
111b7(1): 'a gas pang bdan de'anang du bkod nas/ des kya nagasub mi tu 'ongs te/ des/ sangs mthan nam ra gis byed par bya ba rnyed na pa nyidi khyod da
111b8(1): byas pa'i khras bu yod par 'thun te/ legs mo lenas so// de nas me dang ldan pa po shu 'gas gi bu chen po des bdag gi du rnams dang yang shes par byas te/ de dag gis pos nas mchog tu sa
111b9(1): tu gyu da te/ bcos ldan 'das sa sems dpa' 'ar gyu nas 'akur sti byas so/ son lags kyi de bas na khyod kyis kyi nas mi dgas de dag ni nyes pa des su das kyi 'tshu bar bya ba'i phyir ro// 
111b10(1): snga ngas pa sa mthon par bya'o// bcos pan 'das kyi skye nugalas la nas /  'a rdzogs kyi phuchen po /  dang klu dang/ rnam 'di dang / nas sa 'a du gyis ma ci pa
112a1(1): chen po las sogs pa'i gzhan dag yid rangs so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'i mngon par spyod do// / chu slad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnam
112a2(1): rdo dang / zin ma chen po rnams dang / phyag po rnams dang / pho brang tha~Md kyi snyi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang / ded son rnams dang / na rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / de lA ma yin rnams dang / nam/ 
112a3(1): mkha' lding rnams dang / ko phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sting byas// bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /  lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang
112a4(1): lho phye chen po rnams mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ dang paso das pa chen po dang ldan pa/ na bca' dang / zhes zas dang / su zims ma dang / 'din dang / sum pa mos dang / sra thong rnams rnam pa
112a5(1): dang gnyan thob kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ rgyal pol khab 'od sa'i 'tshal daM khya ka lan dka' gnas pa na rte nad cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgya/ sa po'i khab kyi grong khyer mchong dpon phyug cing nor mad pa yongs spyod che ba
112a6(1): mongs su brjin pa sangs shing rgya ba rnam thos kyi bu'i no dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gra pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs min ma pa las chungs grangs te/ de dang lhan cig tu ze zhing dga' la dag
112a7(1): bgur spyod do// rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod pa las nung ma la khu chags nas / de zla ba brgyad dam chu lon pa dang / bu 'byung nas/ khye'u zhig btses nas de bcas pa'i btsas bston byas te/ khye'u'i phyir ci srad bta sna shes myi
112a8(1): 'dogs par byed do// nye du rnams/ na re khye'u 'di'i rgyu skam ma nu smad la btsas pas na de'i phyir mying chu smad ces btags so zhes zer nas de'i mying chu skad ces btag gis so// de nas khye'u chu spad bsrings skyed de ched skyes nas/ 
112a9(1): de'i tshe la shi ba dang / rang kyi khyim bdag por gyur da to// de nas tshong dus kram nas nyo tshong 'tsho ba 'ar byed pas de nyid cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang dam pa'i chos thos nas bcom ldan
112a10(1): 'das kyi stand pa la dad par gyur da nas/ der rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyed de/ des ma la gsol ba btab pa/ yul bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung gyis gnang bar 'jog cig/ de nas de'i mas smras pa/ 
112b1(1): hU~M rtsig pa zin gyis bdag bye ci srid tshe'i bar du byung zhig bdag zhi ba'i thog tu ci bya byos zhi gtses zer ro// ma mu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad la byin no// yul gyis dge slong dang bram ze dang / thug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkres pa
112b2(1): rnams pa sbyin pa dag byin ces byas so// de'i ma de ni rgan chags can 'jugs pa yo byad rnams la kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/ gdan pa ni de dag spangs nas dge slong dang bram zeg pa dag zas 'dod de khyim der 'ongs pa de dag sa rgya zhing khyod ni
112b3(1): mid nas su skyes pa bzhin du kyis zhug cing srong zhes zed do// debu de la yang bslab par byed de// bdag gis nyan cig bzhin du dge slong ba ni nyid cig la zan byin no zhes sbed phyis pa zhig na gi ba dang yi dgas su skyes sa
112b4(1): bu tu swang sa dang bral ba'i mya nga byed de/ sbyin pa dag byed de zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcos ldan 'das kyi gnad pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // brtson pa dag sgrub tho pa dang / 'apad pas 'bol gyigs pa'i 'khong pa ni nyid mamo zhes
112b5(1): byitan par rig sas 'du byed kyi rnam pa bams cad rnyil pa dang / rnam pa yor pa dang / nas par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par zad chod de/ danyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon na
112b6(1): bar gyu nga par rig nas sgo d+ha'i dbubs bcom pa rig pa dang / mngon pa dzar shes pa dang / so so yang dag por rig pa thob pa srid pa rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang bkur stil gyi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i zhwa rnam
112b7(1): kyis don ci pa zlab sa pa'i gnas su stsa das des ga ga N+DI us dum ma'i skyob po byas te/ bsas gnas rnyed do// de'i sa mi dgas 'a skyes pa yang mong dus ze
112b8(1): su'adra'o// dacer byung 'dug cing dang sti snyas logs pa na ring pocoms ba derab kyi skyeg sa seM bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas kun tudang / me lde 'ab pa cig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i mad byed ce
112b9(1): tshe dang ldan pa ma chu slad kyi thad tu song nas re shig mtshed dang ldan pa su smad kyis ye dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa 'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig yi dgas sos smras pa// bu cig gapa las bcas pa'i/ byabs pa'i ma ni
113a1(1): bdag gi yin te// zas dang skom dang bral ba'i// mi dgas rnams kyi nabadu skyes/ bdag ni ni kha'i dus byas nas/ mo grangs nyi shu lnga lond te/ chu'i gab kyang ma myong la/ kha zas ka zhig gang
113a2(1): mthong / 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi// drungab song de dag 'bras myed 'gyur// gang pa'i tshe la gram dag sor yang // de dag kyang ni sgrub par 'gyur// btsun pa'i shing drung bdel ba lags// khyed kyi snod nang chu yang bsi/ 
113a3(1): kren pa dag 'a thugs rtse skyed// snyoms kyis tungs kyis chab gsol cig// de nas chu slad kyis ma la sbas pa/ yum khyod myi gyud pa'i tshe// bdag gyis sbyin pa dag byin zhing // bsod nams dag byed du la bcug gas/ 
113a4(1): yi dgas mos smras pa// bu cig bdag ni gser snas gnod nas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin// bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/ nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so// bu cig de bas na dad pa 'dris/ 
113a5(1): sa kyi phyid pangs rgyas pa sogs pa/ ni song gi ga kun pas gso nas men kyi mnon pa gso /  shA sa kya gas nas pa srid de// su kyi #
113a6(1): ba de ltar gyis khyod kyang dpral sngon gyi 'dun du 'dug shig yi dgas so/ 6sa smras pa/ bu cig bdag ni cer bur 'dug pa ngo che ste myi thung / bo chu smad kyis spras pa khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo myi tsha nga
113a7(1): kar 'bras bu myong ba'itshe/ ci phyir ro tsha yi dgas sos smras pa son de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o// de nas chu srad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyem du dad pa dris pas/ byid nyin sangs rgyas sa sogs pa dge slong ni dge 'dun pa rnam
113a8(1): la spyan drangs nas gdun mchod la bab na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong kyi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dusayi dgas po de yang 'bral dpon gyi bdun du 'dug ten/ srog chags 'bum 'phrag du sa 'dus pa rnams kyi yi dgas so
113a9(1): mthong / de dag gis me gas ma de'i sus kyi ga pa mthong nas zhin sa ba skyes te/ btsas ldan 'das pa sems dgra 'as kyi/ de nas me ldan bcu da kyi ngas rgyas la gas sa//  na
113a10(1): zas mang pos ches par byas nas/ yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs 'don par gsold to// // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nas sa gas/ 
113b1(1): de ni mi dgas phyi bzhin song // yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs lags/ de ni mya ran tu mthard ka gyud cig// sde gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi de de las brten nas yi dgas so de skye bo mang po
113b2(1): bde dang mthun pa'i chos bston te/ srog chags 'bum 'phrag du mas de mthong nas// de bden pa bzod par 'gyur lo// yi dgas mo de yang sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas
113b3(1): tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes par shes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis spras pa sum da ni mthu' yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang dag kyis shig// yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/ 
113b4(1): cig bdag gyi sbyin pal dga' ba myed dmyi gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis// yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la spras pa// chags pa'i mun pas dmyig ni rab sgribs shing // khyed kyis yi dgas 'jig rten rab bsgrubs
113b5(1): pa'i/ khyod kyis rus pa chen po ga myed pa// nus pa bags hA'i spyi rnams dadung du 'dug/ ces byas so// de nas tshe dang / snyan pa chu smad kyis lan mang du myos nas smras pa// de dag 'on tu gzung
113b6(1): ga thob bo// de nas chu slad kyis dge 'dun la phul te// gang sa dgel 'dun las ras zung cig nyos pa'i dge slong des gdangal zhakra go// de nas yi dgas de mtshan mo 'ongs rgyas so// de
113b7(1): dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa cu smod pa thogs sa / chu spang ma sgo mi dgam ma lus nas kyi dmyigs kyi byin no// de bzhin du lhan gsum kyi bar du dge slong la nus nas me dang ldan pa mu srad kyis phyir bkun phyi
113b8(1): da dge slong sa kyad sa phyogs lan di slong kyi dge 'dun gyi byir bdang sa can no// de nas des phyis can ma nus so// de bas na sems canarnams pa de 'ang rjesams co macas sred pa brjod / 
113b9(1): ci nas kyang / yi dwags mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar myi byung par bya'i phyir sder sA spang pa la rtson par bye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bas lang nas// dge slong de dag dang skad du smram yin
113b10(1): rnams sa pa dang byi pa da 'i phyi pa sa gsogs pags dag kyang 'des ni/ cos dam sa kyis gsungs pa ma ba yod do// sub songasapa kyi ma
114a1(1): / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyag po rnams dang / pho brang kho da kyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / sgra rnams dang

114a4(1): zhal was dang / gzims mdang / gdan dang / bsnyun bsos dang / sran zor rnams rnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge la 'dun dang bcas pa mnyand tu yod pa na rgyas bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin/ 
114a5(1): gyi kun dka' ra ba na gzhugs so de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka' byed snga phrogs thabs dang / chos gos gsol te// srung zed rdzogs nas mnyanan tu yod pa na bsod nams la sod ngo do// sanya nad tu yod par bsod snyoms
114a6(1): byas nas phan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung zed dang chos gos bzhag ste/ yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las tshe dang lnga na pa dga' byed kyis yi dgas mo reg ma 'dral dbus gyong du 'dug par da
114a7(1): gyi sgras g.yogs pa lto ni mi bo tsam la kha di khab kyi myig tsam // / dub 'khrod bzhin du bri ba khwa dang bya rog dang / khyi dang wa rnams kyis bsko de nas phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing bzal ba dang / de na
114a8(1): ya bab ste skos thag nas nyam theg pa'i skad byin te/ sdug bsngal drag po dang / myi zad pa dang / yid du myi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed myi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa sring mo khyod kyis
114a9(1): seMn ga segasas ci zhig byas sa/ des 'di sa bu'i lugs pa myong ning 'dug yi dwags mos smras pa/ nyis ga dad pa la smonas kyi dgos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la don pa de zhus shes/ de khyod la mos kyi rnam par sbyin/ 
114a10(1): bsung bskon gang 'gyu te ga des thos sesems can gzhanadag kyang sdig pa slod khyong byu / de nas me dang rgan pa dag byed bcom ldan 'das gas pa der song ngo // de'i tshe bcos ldan 'das rang du 'jog pas bzhe sa ma
114b1(1): ba ni po rnams sa sbrang bu'i sbrang kyi bskol pa dang 'dra ba'i chos po dang ldan nomachog sod te/ 'khor ba rgya phrag tu ma yang dbang po rnams myi gsol bar bcom ldan 'das pas chos po dang ldan no chog nyan par byed do// de nas

114b7(1): gan su rab tu 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/ des ni sdug pas la 'di 'drug// 'jibras su rung bar myong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa lad pa dga' byed mi dgas mi de'i srin pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/ 
114b8(1): na nyid pa ste bu'i tshe mo te khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs par gyu cos bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges pa dang zhabs su ldan pa pade' bar gshegs pa 'jig rten parnyend pa skyes su 'dus pa tu sbyang na/ 
115a1(1): byed pa lha dang phyi rnams kyi gnas / sangs rgyas bcom pan 'das 'od srung zhes byal 'jig tu 'byung ste ra grong khrer ba man sen drang srong skyes pa'i di dgas kyi nang rgyan cing bzhugs so// 
115a2(1): de nas grong khyer ba lan sen/ bu mo zhi/ 'dug pa de'i chos 'dod/ chos thos nus 'khor stel 'ad lta ba dang/ m+b+ha nams 'das las yon tan du lta ba dang / mya ngan las gdas pA sA smin tan du na byor gyur te/ des pa/ 
115a3(1): las gsol pa nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bsand pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas de'i phyir nye ru rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nasade de na bslob pa dang / myi slob pa'i doge slong ma dag dang/ lhan cig tu gnas

115a11(1): gdag kyang rtogs nas/ gsen sA dang ngas kyi nyes 'ang spyod pa spang ba'i phyir gzom par bya ste \u0f7f/ dge slong la khyed kyis de ltar skab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rje skad ces bkas pa lal na / dge slong de dag dang lda da nga gyur/ 
115b1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnamasas dang / pho blang mod kyi myi rnams dang/ 
116a1(1): skyes / den de sa brdungs pa spyod pa rnams kyis ga de badrug myod pa dungs nas/ rus tu phyir 'gyur ro// de nas de'i nus bu'i man pa byas nas/ phyir gdug pa lang du lhags so// ri nas gnas 'a sa/ 
116a2(1): rkyes mgo ma dang thung zed par sa dris pa la bzhugs pa dang re shig na yi dgas skal ga dang myig kyi sdug pa sa sum mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang spung zed 'dzin cing rnga/ 'dug pa mdzod do// de ltar gyi sdug pa de mthong nas/ 
116a3(1): den slo dag phyi dgarangasagyur / ma mas nas pa gsosod to// de nas bcos pan 'das kyis rigs kyi bus pan rtags pa dang 'thob sa tshigs rnams skyo bskyed pa dang / deme pa'i rnam par ston pa kyi zhum
116a4(1): yang dag yang bgand pa'i phyir / dge grong kyi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun du 'dard te gnas der gshegs so// de nas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum bcus
116a5(1): gnyis kyis legs par brjod pa dpe' byadang bzang po brgyad bcu mdzes par rgyad pa 'od 'dom gang gyis brgyad pa gnyi ma sor pa zhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri 'o lta bu kun nas bzang pa mthong
116a6(1): nas mthong ma thab tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' dab pa skyes te/ de do tsha dang par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char srin gyi 'brug spu lta bur zab pa dang / brda lta bu'i gsub gyis yi dgas
116a7(1): de smos te/ bzhin bzangs khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid 'phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung zed bsgrubs te// des na yi dgas su skyes pa yin gyis pa ya la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chag
116a8(1): bar byas dang legs so// 'di las kyang shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal bar skyes// de nas yi dgas des chos gos dang lhung zed dge 'dun la phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags
116a9(1): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yi dgas kyi phyir lon gyi rabs gsungs pa // skyes pa 'i de'i son thams gang ni mi ye dgas mye ni na song/ yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs nas// des ni mung du
116b1(1): mthar da gyur dacig tu/ de nas yi dgas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/ gi nas yi nags rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so// de nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po rna ca gdugs bkor nga bdag dgul tu thogs pa lus
116b2(1): dogs dang / sen mo ros brgyad pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis lus pa 'acod pa na can/ pus gung kum dang / tam pa'i lom dang / sdig la grogs pas phyags pa// des de nyid kyi srin po lnga'i me tog sus
116b3(1): tha la dang / ku su 'dang / san da ma ba rnams kyis thub pa bka ste/ 'od ma'i chas/ byug lan da ka na gnas pa na khod ra khor yug 'ong chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gyis gtod / 
116b4(1): pa'i phyis spyos sun dus kyi byas 'a 'dus so/ denas bangs 'an sa kyis kyang des de dang mthun pa 'chos yin de thos nas 'da' chen po skyes te song // ri'i che dag pong drod / 
117a1(1): napas dang / phyug po rnams dang / po blang sa yod kyi phyirnams dang / rtse dpon rnams dpe ded dpon rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gdod sbyin rnams dang rnam yin rnams
117a2(1): dang ram mkha' lding rnams dang / kyi 'am ci rnams dang / go phyi chen po rnams kyis bkur mi byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod par byas te/ lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyim rnams dang lha ma yin dang / mkhan
117a3(1): ming dang / byings ci dang / go kye chen po rnams kyis shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na banas dang / zhas kyis dang gzims ma dang gad dung tsun lasos dang / span zong rnams das
117a4(1): rnyis pa nyan thos kyi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'dag gnas pa na brtend cing bzhugs so// de nas tshe drang ldan pa 'am bu sbyin gyi bu sde 'dro shas thabs dang / chos gos bgos
117a5(1): srung med thogs sa rgyal po'i khab tu gsos soms sa gshegs so/ rgyas pa'i rag tu ma danams byas nas/ yin pos tems kyi kyi da pa byas nas/ chos gos dang rgyu med bzhan ste/ mad

117b1(1): sa gsung tu ru dag sdigs sonas gasmras pa sar mdzum payin te/ de yom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang zhan pa 'das su sbyid ci ga bsadas/ dus du sbyin gyi bu zum nag blangs su mame ma

122b6(1): bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de sa srad ces maka' bas khad nas dge gaslong dag dang / zhwa dang rnam yin dang / nam mkha' sri da dbyi'as kyi dang / go phye chen po las gsogs pa gzhan dag kyang yin

122b8(1): sbrul nag dang ni pA ba deng / sa la dang ni dpa' ldan ma/ gos dang ne tso pho nya mo/ ma he dang ni gsol sbyong dang // rang pa tha mar rjod pa yin// sbrul nag po zhes bya ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / 
122b9(1): blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho khrang 'khond kyi phyi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang / ded sngon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 
122b10(1): nam mkha' ldid rnams dang / myi 'a ma cin rdzas dang / lto bye chen rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas de/ mchod par byas te/ lga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhas
122b11(1): snying dang myi 'am ci rnams dang / lto phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / gzims cha dang / bgadan dang / sun bsos pa
123a1(1): khyis bdag byug cing no mngal longs spyod me ba 'angs su badzin pa yangs shid rgya che ba/ nas zos kyi bu'i no pa dang ldan pa/ gnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang gran pa zhig yod de/ de las sems can gzhugs pa yo byad
123a2(1): dmi dus kyi phung po na pos sa/ banaganas/ des ga te nag ba nan pa bzhin rgyun no// shinas rnyed kyi med du smra gdus pa stsal nan po chen pa gyi sus pa zhig tu skyes so// nas skye mo
123a3(1): ma de skye bon thegs ga sod pa de dag/ sa rab pa bcas kyis bsod byud byed do// rgyas po'i ba kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang mi ge yo'i skyed mos las dum sa pa de dag thams can 'drag par 'gyur ro// 
123a4(1): ces rdzu sa pa rgyud te skye bo tshogs kyis kyas rgya po 'anug yin byed lags sa // de nas rgyas po gzungs na ting po 'di gas mas rgyas sa pan
123a5(1): martags par de ga dri sum pa gzhan su zhi gsod sas po nus rgyal gzugs can snying po skye bo snang pa'i bang dang bas pa bcom 'das gas pa der song ste phyid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
123a6(1): go thos phyag satshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyokas gcin tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam kyis yang dag bsan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug
123a7(1): sang dag par gzeng spyod yang dag par dka' bar mdzad do// chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag 'ang 'dzi nad tu 'jug yang dag pang bzed bsod/ yang bar dga' bar
123a8(1): mdzad nas cad myi gsung ba bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po gzugs cas snying po stan las langs te dz+dza/ tha gos phrag pa cig tu bzan nas pus so g.yas pa'i ljangs la bzugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes pade sonas/

123b3(1): na rnying po bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bas// gnang par ri/ nas/ bac+doMm ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'os phyag 'ams te/ gsan las yangs nas song ngo // de nas pabacos ldan 'das de nyid kyi mthun

123b5(1): sreb de dag kyis rnyed po sargyas de dag pasas pan snang bar byas so la pa yo kyi ba du so sa thoms pa'i byasas pa'i spyod pa dag bya kye me de dag gis de'i sum pa sosas pa ga dung tu rnam par byung / 
123b6(1): de nas su gdug 'des pan du drugs te su'i 'grub bdag sus kyis bar gyun se bu gas bu dang / des nas ras rgyas gcos sa 'das kyi su skyes bu chen pos mtshan gsum 'du ma gnyis kyis meg sa tham
123b7(1): ba rgya dad pa dpel byad bzang po brgyad bcus 'dzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gas kyis brgyand pa nyis song bas lhag pa'i 'od mngal ba/ rin po che'i ri bo lta bu kun nas bzapa' mthong ngo // 'thong ma thag tu des bcom

123b10(1): de'i tshe de'i dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' ba la nas// khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ ba ni nga'is cing bya ba byed// myi khom khas ni skyes zin gis// dom myed 'dus pas ci zhig ldan
124a1(1): t+yan 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/ ngal dad pa'i sems bskyed la// dud 'gro'i ste gnas spangs ma legs// 'on tang mthol ris 'gro bar gyur // de nas me shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi mang du
124a2(1): drug bre/ sod ma'i ral du bsams so// de'i skabs su rgyal po dang / yul sa ga ta'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul bdug pa de bcom ldan 'das dzaM ltar brtul ba thos so// de nas sprul bdug pa des rang gyi lus skad de/ 
124a3(1): khachas bcom ldan 'das pa sems dga' bar gyur da te shi nas/ gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// wa'i bu 'am lka'i bu mo skyes nas/ ring por ma ston pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur/

134b9(1): 'jug go// 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtshol chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ 'dus rlabs yul khar yang srid 'dul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba myed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
134b10(1): gzugs can snying po la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad deng / chos gos zin nas/ chos gos gsol da te// lhung zed sngams nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing mtha rad kyis

135a2(1): bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos rnams la phye 'am// phyi ma yin pa 'amaganod sbyin nas/ srin po sham/ ri dgas sam// gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs so/ mtshan mo thog thag nags khrod de na/ Tha phan tshun
135a3(1): 'dor pa byed do// denas rab sadas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das pasan ga sum brjod dbyas nas bzod pa gso te/ bcom ldan 'das ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/ skyes pa laga' sas/ bdag sa
135a4(1): ldan 'das/ mchod pa'i rgyu ci yad ma mchis na/ bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ de lta lags kyis kyang / bdag sngon du mchis ste/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// zhes sbran par 'tshal lod/ 
135a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 'as lad pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas re shig na de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/ mtha dad kyis rgyal po la thad du phyi nad to// de'i tshe rgyal blogazugs can snying po na/ kha ba bzangs kyi steng na/ 
135a6(1): bud myed 'bab shig dang / gsil snyan gyis rtse zhing // dga'u dgur spyod do// de nas ne tso myi skad shes pa des rgyal po la sbas pa// kye rgyal po khyod khyen par mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa khyod
135a7(1): kyi yul shes pa lags kyis// ka khyod kyis bshos sa gon/ mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po shi dad tu rings par te/ khang zangs kyi ste/ nas/ byas nas blon po chen po'i tshogs zhabs bring byas te

135b1(1): dkyir ge 'dun dang bcas pa ra bkus gi chen po dang ldan 'as nang du bya drangs nas zhal zas dang bzang thos mchim yang byas so// de nas ne tse / 'di snyam du sems te// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi/  dge 'dun dang gyi 'byo nga

135b3(1): byed te bas da// bcom ldan 'das sa sems dga' ba skyed de/ gnas gsum bcu rtsa gsus pa'i wA sul bzang zod skyes so// lha'i bu 'am/ kwa'i bu mo// skyes nas ring po ma son pa na chos nyid kyis/ sems rnam pa gsum
135b4(1): skye bar gyur da te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang / tu skyes las gang gyis skyes snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar
135b5(1): bdag nags yod pa bcom ldan 'das pas pa'i byed 'gro sus so de nas sngon na tsor gyur pa/ sa'i bu na ma 'dug god can dag cig la pa thogs pa bus dog pa dang / ses mo 'dos brgyad pa/ 
135b6(1): nor bu rin po cha sA tshogs kyis brgyand pa'i cod dpan cad lus gud kum dang ta pa la'i lo pa dang / sri ka la las sogs pas byugs pa/ das de nyid kyi mtshan mo/ me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang / ku u ta dang pad ma dkar
135b7(1): po dang / naman 'dam pa rnams kyis thul pa bkad ste/ rgyas bu rgyas byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtod te/ chos cadad pa'i phred bcos ldan 'das kyi spyan du
135b8(1): 'dun no// se nas bcos ldan 'das sngon ne codar gyu dad pa ga'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams sa dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bdenag ni rtogs par gyu da pa de lta bu'i chos ston te/ de thos nam
135b9(1): donan ma byung pa'i ba'i bus 'arje snyoms pa lta ba'i de'i rtse mo mthon so// nyi shu me zhes rdo rjes bcoms/ da datu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu tho te/ des gong nas dgas pa tshig pan gsus son ni
136a1(1): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / mchis ma'i rgya mtshol skams pa dang / rus pa'i la sprul pa dang / ngan song gyi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang mtha dad pa'i sgo rnams phyed pa dang / 
136a2(1): bdag ga dang byi rnams kyi na tu 'anag pa 'di sa bu ni bdag la pas kyang sa bgyis/ mas kyis sa bgyis/ rgyal thos kyang sa bgyis/ klarnabs kyis kyang ma bgyis// nang kyi byirnams dang / gnyen gyi tshogs rnangs kyis dkyangs kyi
136a3(1): mngon gyi btsun pa rnams kyis kyang sa bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang sprus pa nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngam song lam/ shin tu myi zad khyed kyisathul yis bcad/ bsod nams
136a4(1): rab ldan mthos ris 'gro ba bye/ mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag kyis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i myig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las rten nas thob// bdag ni sug sAl rgya mtshol pha ro la rgald

136a6(1): dgas pasu dgas kyas te/ dud kyi zhas gnyis pa ni byag sa nyanas/ dgra thu yi ni rgon pa byas nas kyang /  'jig nyid sa na dul song/ de nas soni sa cong byas pa'i sa bu tshad pa kye grogs phyis/ nya
136a7(1): bdas zheng ba'i byu rgyam par gyudad pa dang // dpa' po gtu la ba rgyab pa dang / dad pa las padan las pa da pa bzhin du 'khyod pa ga kyis banos ldan 'das kyi bad du gongs pa'i byod pa de nyid kyis rang gyi gnas su mang ngo // dge slong dag ni

136b1(1): rnams kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba la ba/ dge slong dag ne co na nyid gi nas/ gsum bsu rtsa gsum pa'i lba yul bzang por skyes pa de yin do/ dge slong rnams kyi
136b2(1): gsol da pa/ btsun pa de ne tsor gyur da pa'i lnga'i bus las ga gyis na des ni me cod skyes lags/ de nas lnga'i nang du skyes ste bden pathod/ sngon ne cor gyu da pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gyis nyams su skyong bar
136b3(1): gyur da te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol dkyi sa'i khams la/ rnam par sbyin par myi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlur gyi khams la rnams par sbyin par myi 'gyur da te// las dge ba dang myi

136b5(1): 'bras bu nyid sbyid pa gyur// dge slong dag don byum pa 'das pa'i dang 'dus sa skasad pa bzang po 'di nyid pa ste gu'i tshe bo khri thub pan/ re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang

136b8(1): na me pa pa gyu ro//  na rnams senas par smras pa na sad g+hA // de slod da de bsanalas cig padag tu namapa nga/ sa dre pa rnam pa sams kyi ngag rjen pa
137a1(1): hA zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das smra blo rnams dang blon po ches po rnams deng / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang khrod kyi skye rnams dang / rdo'i dpon rnams dang / ded khyen rnams dang / skanams dang / grwa nas

137b1(1): zhabs la mthong bar cal te bdag kyis sun ring mo zhig tu mthob bas ha~M/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong par 'phrul bas bsgom lags so bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthob par 'tshal na/ thugs che ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das

137b3(1): khab tu song nas thard kyis gsod pa las rgyal po'i khab kyi glo khyed tu phyinan to// de nas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer thams cad du ltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos

137b8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la nyas par dgos te/ gshegs su gsol zhes bkas pas pa te// de nas bcos ldan 'das kyis byi de sa cang myi gsung bar sna / de nas bcom ldan 'das pasam zla gsum nas chos gos mdzad de// 
137b9(1): chos gos zin nas srung zed rnams das / gas bre 'tha ma go dag dang / gtand tu yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so// pa po nya yang shing gzhon// tas pa/ de nas sangs rgyas bcos 'an 'das zhabs kyis thegs pa yod du/ 
138a1(1): shing rta las pas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba ded logs su thal mo sbyadad pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rtse ba'i slad du bdag shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhe su gsol/ bcom ldan
138a2(1): kA 'das kyis bka' bstsal dpa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ka pa'i shing rtani// yang dag sngo la da dra gnas nas// nyon mongs tsher mas nod par sa seng kun tu rgyu bar byed// pho nyas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis/ 
138a3(1): kyang ga bdag la phag tags pa dang / thugs rtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das lo nya la lan 'dags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shi ta'i steng du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta bcibs bzhin du mnyand tu/ 
138a4(1): ga par bye da/  nyis kyang chubacob ldan no// denas rgya med zan pa dang / bkra mi da kyi phyi dang / dus byernams kyisa'i com sa 'das 'asus nas chom bya su pa'i byid/ de'i na rgyas bu rgyab byed kyi 'i nyid nom
138a5(1): po nye ste'i mi thung ste/ chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo ni ste// de shi na sa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i wA yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu 'am sgra'i bu mod skyes nas ring po malon pa ni/ chos nyid kyis sems nam
138a6(1): pa gsus skye bar gyur te/ gang nas shi 'a thos gang tu skyes las ga gyis skyes snyam so// de nas myi las shi 'phos pa dang / gsum bcu pa gsum pa'i lta yul bzang pong skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems
138a7(1): dag le bar gyudan pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon po nyan gyu dad pa'i lha'i bus/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag yon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das lta ba'i phyir 'gro ba 'di bdag kyi rdza ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma yon par bcom ldan 'das
138a8(1): sa k+ta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/ de nas sos po nyam gyur da pa'i lha'i bu rna cha la dugs skon can dag cing 'gul bar thogs pa lus doshas dang sen mo dos brgya dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgya dad pa'i chos can/ lus ku dkus dang /

138a10(1): bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor na te/ chos nyand pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngam 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon pho nyad gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag sa nyas dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
138b1(1): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs khang gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bas nad te/ de thos nas sngon po nyer gyur pa'i sgra'i bus 'jigs tshogs pa lta bu'i ri'i rtse mo mablon po nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyus tu zhugs pa'i gabras bu thob de
138b2(1): na mabs thong nas dgal ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod nas// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag kyi khral dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho la bskams pa dang / rus pa'i sgral pa dang / ngas ngan song sbyi rnams bcad pa dang / mthol ris dang
138b3(1): tha dad pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang dang / bdag lpa dang byi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu bdag la las kyang mA bgyis rnams kyang sa bgyis/ rgyal thos kyangs bgyis/ grwa rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis te nang kyi myi dang gnyen gyi tshogs
138b4(1): rnam kyis byangs kyis/ sngon gyi rnams kyis bya pa gyis/ dge slong dang gras se rnams kyis byed ma pa gyis/ rang smra sa 'gyes pa meng 'o 'du na so sum// shis gyi bar khyod kyisan mas cad/ yod
138b5(1): nams dpa ldan mtho ris 'gro ba bye rna mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang 'dan sa thos/ bdag gyis de ning nyes pa spangs pa'i dmyig/ shind/ rnas dag khyed la rten nas thol// bdag gyi sug snga la rgya mtshol ny+dza1tu
138b6(1): pa no lad rga lad 'phags pa dges pa'i zhi bu'i nom par thob/ gyi mchog dbang po sman pa myis mchod pa// skye dang ma dang / mi ba'i nA spangs pa/ srid pa stod du mthong 'ang dga' ba'i/ thub pa
138b7(1): de nas pho nya byangan pa'i lha'i bu de tsho pa khyi sogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal par gyud pa dang / dpa' bo yul las rgyal po dang / rked pa nad thams cad las tha dad pa bzhin du/ 'byod pa gang gyis bcom ldan
138b8(1): 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i khyod da pa de nyid kyis rab gyi gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khangs bzangs kyi steng na/ 'dug nas sngar chen po de mthong nas nas 'das pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ 
138b9(1): sa sa gdagasus kyi rkyen na salas pa dang/  'a/ nga spyod ba na sam mas pa'i ma su gas 'bas ma na sa kyis
139a1(1): rgyal po chen po myes brjed kyi tshangs pa 'am/ zhwa'i dbang po rgya byin nas/ 'jig rten skyong ga bzhi la sa ba bya'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi khyod po nyad nga la sems dgas par gyur nas/ shi ste gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
139a2(1): kA shul bzang yod skyes nas / de sa dang gsum pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rab gyi gnas su song/ de nas rgyal po po mtsham du gyur nas/ kye sangs rgyas/ kye chos kyi dges 'dun 'di
139a3(1): dag sa ni myu du zhig byas kyang rnam/ ba sbyin pa chen po 'gyur zhes smras so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la mngon par stod cing rjes su yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
139a4(1): stan las yangs te song ngo // der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' bas med pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas mchog tu bdags pa dang chos mchog tu bdag
139a5(1): tha dang ga dges 'dun mchog tu bdags pa'o// sangs rgyas mchog tu bdags du pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang byed rnams sam/ rkang nyis rnam das bsam// rkang bzhi rnams pasas/ rkang mangs rnams sam/ bzun
139a6(1): rnams pa/ sa yin pan sa pa na rnamasadang bamed/ yus ba snye pas nas
139a7(1): de dag kyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'acog pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin 'das dang to/ sangs rgyas ma mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni/ mchogs la mngon 'a nam pa yin te/ 
139a8(1): ma mngon par dag pa de dag ni rnam par sbyind pa yang lha rnams kyi nang tu/ slar gyur pa rnams sram/ gyi rnams kyi nang du phyi gyurd pa 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu bdags pa zhes bya'o// 
139a9(1): mchog tu bdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas pas 'dus ma rdzas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung se de dag kyi nang na ni// 'dod chags bral ba'i spos mchog yin pad+ma 'gon tsa/  rjes la mngon par dga' ba su yang rud ba na

143a10(1): po la ka ba zhig rten te/ sngon bdag gyi pha rtag tu ka ga nyidi la spos dang / gdug pa dang me tog kyis mchod pa bgyis na// 'di 'phyang ste gzigs shig ces byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham 'breng ba rnams pa ka ba ni phyung
143b1(1): shin ces sgo'o// de nas rgyal po'i zhas bring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang // de'i 'og nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / dge snyen gyi srab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang / mthud pa'i chos gsum bcu
143b2(1): rtsa bdun gser kyi glegs pas zhig la bris pa zhig rnyed do// de nas rgyal pos klu de la sten nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bris te byin no// drang srong bye ba gnas pa'i drang srong khri gnyis stong byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i cho
143b3(1): gsum lu rtsa bdun mngon gsum du byas so// klu nas kyang sten nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan bsrungs nas/  na na dga' ste lus pyod nas de kha chos te 'dug go// de nas ni ste gso kho da lnga brgya dang bcas te/ gsum bcus gsum pa'i
