195a4(1): com skyes te/ the tsom thams gcad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lag na gsor pa / thogs kyis/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des 'di'i sug pa gnyis las gser gyi dod tse mtshan mas btad

195b2(1): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon srung sangs rgyas kyi phrin pas thams cad mdzad nas/ gang zad pa'i skye bzhin du pu pa po lpag sa byed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kyi byings su yongs su mya dran mas nas dus sa// rdul po hra hra/

195b10(1): sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang pho brang khod kyi myi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / deng bon rnams dang / lha rnams dang

197b10(1): skyed pa dang / sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma/ bdag dang gang tu skyes pa de dang / de mgos mtshan can gos dang gyon la dge slod kyi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te / tshe rabs dran par gyur da cig ces byas so// 
198a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal bas med pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po kri kri'i bur gyur da pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/ rgyu de nyid kyis phyag pa'i
198a2(1): rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing lta na sug la mdzes pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur to// dger slong dag de ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par smi nad par yang cig tu nges par gya nag par 'gyur ro// 
198a3(1): las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par sbyind pa yang cig tu nges pam dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni/ rnam par sbyin de pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na// las cig tu nges par gnag pa

198b5(1): nang kyi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur da to// de nas gang gi tshe khye'u sngags pa shes cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig nga ba song do de nas des bcom ldan 'das su sru skyes bu chen po'i mtshar

202a6(1): mas can tha sa tu zhug nas/  da ce se las kyi da mas ca thasas na lasate/ ma 'as dasas 'di sa
202a7(1): gsolang to// btsun pa kye lnga'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing khyod lags so// lha'i 'khor da kyi nang nas sangs rgyas la shes nas dang pa dang ldan te/ gsus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha'i bu dag kyang mchis so// chos dang
202a8(1): dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgos pa'i tshul khrims la zhes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lda byelu gas gyi bu chen pos spras pa
202a9(1): mthun par rgongs te/ tshe dang ldan pa me lu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' bsu lad to// me'u 'gal gi bu de ni de bzhin te/ de ni de bzhin no// kye ma'i lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lA'i khor da na
202a10(1): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas/ 'dir skyes pa'i ltos de lta bu/ dag kyang yod do// chos dang dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te
202b1(1): sub dang tha nas pa 'dir skyes pa dag kyang yod do// de nas ga'i dbang po rgya byin gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa se'u 'gas gi bu chen pos smras pas kyi 'thun par bsams to chod/ 
202b2(1): ldan pa tu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces spras so// btsun pa e lugs gi bu chen pos de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lA'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lA'i kho ra kyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa
202b3(1): dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir bskyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do// chos dang dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims shes na dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do// 
202b4(1): de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen po dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis sbas pa la mthun par bsams te/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu
202b5(1): chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu/ chen po de ni de bzhin no// 'di ni de bzhin te/ kye ma lha'i 'khod snatshogs 'dus shing 'khod do// lha'i kho dad kyi nang ma sangs rgyas la shes nas/ 
202b6(1): dad pa dang ldan te/ sus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha'i bu dag kyi yod do// chos dang dge 'dus/ 'phags pa dges pa'i tshul 'aM/ mas la shes nas rang pa dang ldan te/  sus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa/ 
202b7(1): de lta bu dag kyang med do// de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzard nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thas mo sbya rad pa btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces la sol to/ 
202b8(1): btsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir ba skyes pa legs so// lha gzhan dag cig gyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag ni chos dang dge 'dun dang // 
202b9(1): 'phazham pa 'ges pa'i 'tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te/ lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so// de nas der lnga brgya 'khras/ yu ma dang / lA stong phrag tum dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyund tu
202b10(1): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rdza sprod pa byas nas de nyid du myi snang par gyu rer to// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u gal gyi bu chen pos ltal rnams dong bar rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
203a1(1): / logs su thal mo sbya dad pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bso lang to// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'dod pa
203a2(1): chung ngam/ nyam mnga' ba chung dam/ bskod pa ya dam/ 'tshe 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ rtson 'grus dang ldan nam/ myi bdel ba myi spanga' 'am/ bdel ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang mchi lags so// bcom ldan
203a3(1): das kyis bka' bas lad pa moSh+Ta 'gal gyi bu khyod dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde la byu dad cig/ mo'u gal gyis gsol da pa// btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni
203a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal date/ 'di skad ces kyang mchi 'o// btsun pa 'jam bu'i glid pa'i myi rnams bcom ldan 'das lta ba dang / zad du mchil pa dang / bsnyen skur bgyi ba'i slad du gsum bcu rtsa gsum
203a5(1): pa'i lha yul tu mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu' ma a n+ti nas na/ gsum bcu bya bu'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum bcu rma gsum pa'i lha rnam sa bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang zad du mdzin
203a6(1): pa dang / snyen bkur bgyi ba'i 'asrad tu 'jam bu gling tu ma mchis pa na/ lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mthu' mchis na/ thugs rtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i 6
203a7(1): gling du gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' bas med pa// me'u 'gal gyi bu'o na/ khyed/ 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la kye
203a8(1): bcom ldan 'das nid sde zhag btum na gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling tu grong khyer sngar ldan gyi 'dab a pad dza ra'i gnas su shing u kum pa ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sbron cig/ de nas tshe dang / 
203a9(1): ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas pas khad pa// mnyand te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa ma dper dang / myi stobs po che 'i la
203a10(1): pa bskum pa dang brgyad pa 'am/ rkyang ba las bskums pa bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas myi sdang bar gyur na te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du song bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting re/ 
203b1(1): 'dzind la bsnyoms par bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu gling du 'ongs nas ni/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la spros pa de/ kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun/ gsum bcu rtsa gsuM/ 
203b2(1): pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu gring grong khyer sdeng ldan gyi 'dab/ a pad dza re'i nags su shing u tum pa ra'i drung du gshegs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe/ srog chags 'bun
203b3(1): phrag tu ma bcom ldan 'dasapa'i phyir 'dus so// de nas der dge slong rdzus ste skye ba zhig 'byung ste/ des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / lha dang lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lji pa dang
203b4(1): myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dag bshos la s+yan drangs nas/ re shig nu gdugs tshod la khab pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu lba'i bdan tar yug khyim chen pos/ g.yogs pa dag dang / lAsi zhal zas dang / gza' ba dang

203b10(1): shes pa dang / mo so yang dag pa zlog pa srid bA rnyed pa dang/ chags dang / bkur sti la myi lta ba dang / dbapad pa nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to//

204a10(1): shos kyis ni/ de dag kyi rkang pa la phyag/ 'tshal nas/ smon lam btab pa 'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag la rten te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas pa'i dge ba'i mu ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang la sbyin par bya ba'i
204b1(1): chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag rab tu 'byung ste/ yo byad kyi khyad me dag gis 'brel bar gyur dacig ces byas so// dge slong de dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i mede'i dus ma dge slong nas tu byed 'dra
204b2(1): byu da pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin no// bsol pa btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na des rdzus te skyes legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba sa med pa/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung

204b8(1): 'a tsha las su na kyi la zhing nyid na zus // des slong da'i de ga na pas tshig tu nges pani gnas sa rnam pani/ rnas par sri dad pa sa chi rim par ga pasri /

206a6(1): rlub kyi khams la rnam par sbyin par myi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / myi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni 'dzind pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par

206a8(1): pa bzang po 'di nyid la// skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dpe zhabs su ldan pa/ bde' bar gshegs pa 'jig rten 'khyend pa
206a9(1): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla ma skyed pa/ lnga dang phyi rnams kyi sond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gro khyer mdzes ldan marten
206a10(1): cing bzhags so// de nas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i dbu' skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten thigs so// de nas re shrIg na de'i dus ston zhig 'byung ba'i tshe/ mdza sta bo dag gcig go mchod rten gyi drung du dod pa las
206b1(1): de rag kyis mchod rten de mthong nas dad pa skyes se me tog btags so// de dag gyi nang nas/ badz+ra sde po gcig dnge bdag can ni ci yid myed kyis bdag ni ni yang myi byed do// zhes zer nas de mdza sde de dag gyi nang nas phyi
206b2(1): byabyung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/ des mye tog rnam pa sna tshogs btus nas/ mchod rten nyid la me tog phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba su pad pa// dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
206b3(1): mdza sde po 'gyod pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gyi dbu'i sgra dang sen mo 'i mchod rten la me tog 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no// dge slong dag mdzes pas ni las
206b4(1): gzhan dag byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i rgyus nang / grong 'khyer ba ra na se na/ tshong pon zhig gnas pa des rang sangs rgyas nang pa zhig mthong nas de dad pa skyes te rkang pa la phyag
206b5(1): 'tshal nas bsod snyoms kyang phul/ gos kyang phul lo// dge slongade dag ci snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshe dben du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no// gzhan yang bcom
206b6(1): las 'das 'od srung gyi ring la 'bul po shing tun zhig tu gyur te/ de ra 'i yul zhig tu shing zur mong pa dang / des mchod rten zhig mthong bdang / mchod brten de'i 'khom sa na su dag kyang skyes so/ de das
206b7(1): dad pa skyes nas des phra rnams kyang phyung ste/ phyags ma thogs pa dang / mchod rten dang mchod rten gyi khong sa byas so// de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon las btab pa/ dge ba'i khu ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis ni
206b8(1): 'dagag d+ha la bag ni ldan dugapa sanges par gyu / mas pa'i namang dag pa 'ardzogs pa'i rmongs kyu rnams kyis par byan ci sa / sa ga sa kyi man 'das pa ni
206b9(1): dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dbul po'i shing thun du gyur pa gang yin pa rnams ni mdzes pa 'di nyid yin te/ des marton dang / mchod rten gyi khor sa phyags pa des na gang dang gang tu skyes pa de dang der
206b10(1): gzugs bzang zhing lta na sug pa mdzes par 'gyur ro// rgyu de nyid kyis na/ da ltar dgra bcom pa/ nyid mngon gsum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyin
207a1(1): pa yang gcig tu gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu des par dkar ba rnams ni/ rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par sbyin pa yang 'dren mar
207a2(1): 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar bar rnams 'ba' shig la rtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar slab
207a3(1): bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bskuld nas/ dge slong de dag yid dngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par spyod do// / ka bi na zhes bya ba ni
207a4(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang khor da kyi myi rnams dang // tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang klu rnams dang / 
207a5(1): gnod sbyin rnams dang / kA ma yin rnams dang / nam ma lding rnarnams dang / myi 'am ci rnams dang / oM// phye chen rnams kyis bkur tir byas/ bla mar byas ri mor byas// mchod
207a6(1): par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / l+h+wam yin dang / khyi 'am ci dang / so phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzag dang/ 
207a7(1): zhal zas dang / gzigs cha dang / ba dan dang / spyan bsos dang / sran zeng rnams nyes pa nyam thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ mnyand tu yod pa ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dag sar ba ma
207a8(1): bzhugs so// de'i tshe sgo phyogs na rgyal lo rtogs ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de// de'i ringal 'byor dky-i dang / rgyas kyi/ dang bdel ba dang / sro legs pa dang / skye bo ma pa pos gang ba dang / bzod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi bdang
207a9(1): 'khrug pa dang / nang khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ke dang nas rnams myed pa dang / 'bras sa lu dang / bu 'am shi ba dang ba lA dra dang ma de dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa myed cing che sa krugs la/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du
207a10(1): rgyal srid sbyangs so// de nas phyis re shig na btsun mo dang skra cig rtse zhing dka' la dga' mgur skyed do// rtse zhing dga' la dka' gur snod las btsun mo la bu chags nas te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu 'byung ste/ khye'u gzugs
207b1(1): bzang zhing lta na sug la mdzes a yan lag nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de nas btsas pa'i bcas ston byas nas ka bi na zhes mying btags so// de nas khye'u kaM bi na pang na tshel ba'i mam gnyis dang / 
207b2(1): du ma srun pa'i mam gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / ze ba'i mam gnyis te/ mam brgyad la brtad nas/ de mam brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang sar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi nyin khu dang / gzhan yang
207b3(1): yo byad kyi khyad kha bzang ngo mchog kyis skyed srings te/ mtsho ni nad gyi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par 'gyur ro// gang kyi tshe nyin par rgyal po'i bu ki bi na btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par blon po khri brgya stong gyi bu yang btsas te/ thams/ 
207b4(1): cad kyang tshanang po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go// de dag gyi khying yung so so'i rkyen du mchen mar byas so// de nas re shig na rgyal ze rtogs ldan shi nas/ de'i 'od tu ka li na rgyal por bcug go// blon po'i bu khri brgya
207b5(1): stong de dag thams cad kyang blon por bskos te/ de nas phyi zhig rgyal po ka bi na blon po khri brgyad stor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te/ ri dgas shor du song ba dang / des mdun logs dang / rgya ba logs su
207b6(1): dpung po che thams cad blta gnas// blon po rnams la dris pa kra ka da lta ra ra'i dpung chen po 'di lta bu dgra / gzhan su la yod ces byas so// de na sa blon po snyan da bar sba ba rnams kyis lnga su yab mchis zhes byas so// 
207b7(1): de nas yul dbus nas tshong pa dag cig lho phyogs su song ba de dag gyis rgyal po ka lin chen po la skyes phul lo// de nas rgyal pos spras pa/ kye tshong pa dag yul de'i rgyal po su yin/ tshong pa rnams kyis bsol pa lha yul kha cig
207b8(1): na ni myi mang po tshogs pa dbang byed do// yul kha cig na ni rgyal po dbang bgyid do// de nas re shig na rgyal po/ ka bi na bos mnyand tu yod pa la phyogs grong khyer chen po drug tu pho nya btang te/ gal te khyed 'greng ba la bab na
207b9(1): yang mdug par myur tu shog shig de lta ma byas na// chags pas cher bcad do zhes byas so// de nas tshig de thos nas grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams 'jigs shing skrag la myi dga' ste// spyi bu zhes byas nas
207b10(1): 'dugs tshogs te 'gros mthun par byas nas mnyand tu yod par lhags so// denas bcom/ ldan 'das kyi thar du song ste/ gtam de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to// de ba com ldan 'das kyis de dag dbugs phyung se
208a1(1): lo nya de'i thad du song khug cig ces bkal pa byamar to// de nas de dag gyis pho nya la go bo cag gyi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po yod kyis re shig de'i spyan sngar 'dug mchis shig ces bsgo'o// de ras bcom ldan 'das
208a2(1): kyis pho nya 'ong bar thugs su chud nas// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khA'i grong khyer lta na sug dang 'dra bar mi rin po che snga bzhir sru lang to// rgyal po chen po bzhi ni de'i dpon lta bur bkod do// glang po'i che bsrub gi bu dag dang rta sprin
208a3(1): kyi shugs can dang / shing rta dka' byed sgra lta bu dag dang / myi gnod sbyin myi bzad pa lta bu dag kyang bkod do bcom ldan 'das nyid ni 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i malugs su srul to// gseng ge'i khri 'pha ba ta la bdun tsam
208a4(1): du yod pa yod srus te/ de sa bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// pho nyas de lta bur mdzes pa de dag mthong ngo mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin yig bris nas po nya de la bka' la stsal pa// rgyal po ka
208a5(1): bi ni nga re phrin yig mthong ba de kho na'i tshe gal te/ khyed gleng pa de la bab pa na de yang ma 'dug par myur du shog shig/ gal te ma 'ongs dpung gyi tshogs chen po dang / 'oms zhes gyis shig de nas pho nya song ste/ rgyal po ka b+hi na chen
208a6(1): po la phrin yig dang / 'thon du 'bru ba de dag thams cad byas so// de ras rgyal po ka bi na chen po blon po chen po khri brgya stor gyis zham brin/ byas te/ mthadad kyis yong nas mnyand tu yod par phyind pa dang / 
208a7(1): nyi 'og gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyal po ka byin chen po bsus nas/ de dag kyis bkur sti chen pos grong khyer tu shegs su gsol zhes// gnos nas bcom lda na 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'ong bar thug
208a8(1): su chud nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin tu skul to// de nas rgyal po ka bI na chen po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / mthong ma thag tu de'i gzugs la/ gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang / dbang phyug gyi rgyags pa dang gang yin pa
208a9(1): de myed par gyur to// bsobs kyis dregs pa nid dung yod bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ dbang po'i bzhu khyer te 'ongs nas legs so s+yas
208a10(1): du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa skyed pa'i mod la/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ kha lo nga'i cha lugs kyis gzhu phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka bi na chen po la byin na/ rgyal po ka bi na chen pos
208b1(1): gteg par yang ma nus na sa rtung pa lta ga la nus na de bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi rnga bo che bdun srul da te/ nyid kyis gzhu de bla gas bzhin du rdungs nas snga mda' 'phangs te daso/ de nas lugs kyi rnga bo che bdun char than/ 
208b2(1): byang nas de nas spu byung ba// nges par 'byung gtum par gyis/ sangs rgyas stan la sbyor bar gyis/ 'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin khyim badrag sde ni 'joms par gyis// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ bag yod spyod par byed
208b3(1): pa ni/ skye ba'i khor lo rab spangs nas// sug sngal zad par byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byang nas/ sgra de yang 'og myen gyi lha yul man chad du grag go// de nas rgyal po ka li na chen po'i stobs kyis dregs pa de yang
208b4(1): myeskyed par gyur / te/ de'i blo skyes pa/ e sa de ci zhig snyam so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal khroshA~Mka bi mchen po'i sems kyi rgyu thugs pa su chud nas// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i cha thugs su gyi snang bar
208b5(1): mdzad de// mdol 'di gsungs so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegasad/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid stobs bcudang ldan pa / myi 'jigs pa bzhis myi 'jigs pa khyu mchog kyi
208b6(1): gnas rgya chen po la dam bcas pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sgyur ba/ 'khor da kyi neng yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste 'di ltar 'byung na skyes pa'i las 'di skye bar gyur da te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis
208b7(1): rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyend kyis kyir dang gzugs/ myir dang / gzugs kyi rkyend kyis/ skye mched drug/ skye mched drug byi rkyend kyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba// tshor pa'i rkyend kyis le nad/ 
208b8(1): le nad pa'i rkye nad kyis srid pa srid pa'i rkyend kyis skye ba / skye ba'i rkyend kyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / bsdug bsngas dang / yid myi bdes pa dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar gyur te/ 
208b9(1): de ltar na sdug bsngal kyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'di myed de/ 'di myi 'byung na/ 'di 'gags pas/ 'gag par gyur sa te/ de 'di sa se ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gas
208b10(1): 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa shagaska bas// mying dang gzugs bgag/ mying dang gzugs 'gas pas/ skye mched drug 'gags/ skye mched drug 'phags pas reg pas 'gag
209a1(1): 'gag pa 'gag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre/ sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde' ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par gyur da te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di
209a2(1): zhag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa'i bsal bar rnam par phye ba// rgya ba gcod pa// lha dang myi/ man chod la yang dag par sel dpar bstand pa yin te/ de ltar chos legs par
209a3(1): gsungs pa gsal bar rnam par phye ba/ rgyu ba bcod pa lha dang / myi man chad la yang dag par legs par bstand pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu 'byung bas stond pa'i bstand pa la khron par bya ba'i rigs kho na'o// 
209a4(1): spyor par bya ba'i rigs so// bag yod par bya ba'i rigs so// lus kyi shakhrag kun skams te/ bags pa dang / chu pa dang / dus pa 'ba'ashig dang lus pa ni bla'i// chos rnams la khron 'grus brtsams pa
209a5(1): mthu dang ldan pa/ brtson khrus dang ldan pa spro ba dang ldan pa/ mthu' du sa bas nad pa/ brtson pa myi 'dor bus/ thob par byas paragang yin pa des ma thob kyi bar du/ bar ma mdor brtson 'grus
209a6(1): btang par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ le o can ni sdug snga la bzhin du gnas pa ste/ snyig pa myi dge' ba'i chos kun nas nyen mongs par byedade pa/ yang srid par skye bar byed pa'i rims nad bcas pa sdug bsngal
209a7(1): sdig pa/ myi dgel ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/ yang srid par skye bar byed pa// rims nang dang bcas pa/ suka sngal gyi rnam par sbyin pa ldan pa/ phyi la skye ba dang / rga shing gyu rad pa rnams dang ma 'dres
209a8(1): meng yongs su gas pang gyu sa yong das sa sus sa ldan nanas du satsu na sa sesas rgya / 
209b1(1): par byed pa bdes par gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung ba'i gsungs pa'i rabs 'di ni nyi ku btung bar 'os pa yin no// dge slong dag de bas na/ bdag gi don gzhan gyi don dang / gnyi ga'i don yang dag/ 
209b2(1): par mthong pa rnams kyi su 'di la so so nas legs par bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar byas nas bdag cag rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / bde' ba bskyed pa dang / bde' ba'i rnam par
209b3(1): sbyind par gyur la gang bdag gyi gos dang / zas dang malnga cha dang / bstand/ nad bsos dang ke/ sman zong rnams bdag bcag gyis long spyad pa de dag kyis bkur sti de dag kyang ji ltar byas na/ 'bras bu shi nad tu che
209b4(1): dang / phan yon che ba dang / byind che ba dang / rgya che bar 'gyur zhing 'gu snyam du dge slong khyed kyis de ltar slab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs nyadri bshad pa na/ rgyal po chen po khri brgyad stong gyi khor da dang / 'jig
209b5(1): tshogs so lta ba'i ri'i bre mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsu du byas te/ bden pa ma/ thod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste
209b6(1): des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas yos byig lnga ba'i 'khom mo 'di nyid shesol ning myi nyan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyim pa dang / spang pa dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam pa
209b7(1): 'jig pa'i chos can yin par phrad cod de nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas nas/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur dad nas/ gser dang //

209b9(1): sos yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sati la myi lta ba// dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su
209b10(1): gyur to// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes pa// the tsom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa ka bi na 'di las gang dag kha gyis nahA/ des gzugs bzang zhing
210a1(1): ka na sug la 'dzes pa dang / blon po khri rgyang stong gi 'khor da dang bcas pam chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur pa pa/ rab tu 'byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum tu bgyis lags// bcom ldan 'das
210a2(1): kyis bka' ba sad pa// dge slong dag ka'i na 'di nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen bsgrub dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin tu 'byung la/ gdon myi za' bar 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pas ni/ 
210a3(1): de dag gzhan su zhig gyis nyams su myong bar gyur da te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smind par myi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gyi khams dang / 
210a4(1): rnam par sbyin da par myi 'gyur / te/ las dge ba dang myi dge ba rnams ni 'azi nad pa'i phu po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par sbyind par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gyi las rnams ni// bska pa dang
210a5(1): rgyar yang chung kyi za'u// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du sbyind par 'gyur/ sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskul pa pa dgu bcu rtsa cig pa la ste dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshes
210a6(1): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhwa khas su ldan pa/ bde' bar gshegs pa 'jig rten khyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/  lnga dang myi rnams kyi sond pa sangs
210a7(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang nyin ldan rten cing bzhugs so// de nas re shig naM/ ded dpon zhig gyis rgya mtsho' chen po'i nang nas rin po che mang che
210a8(1): khyer te 'ongs nas/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi khar bshos la spyan drangs so// gabyug la kharda yang thigs nas/ phyogs bzhi'i
210a9(1): dge 'dun la phul nas// dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na / ded dpon du gyur da pa gang yin pa de ni ka bi na 'di yin no// dge slong dag ka bi nas ning / las gzhan dag byas shing bsags te/ dge slong
210a10(1): dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba ra nas na rgyalo khyed de/ 'di'i ring la 'byor da pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde'i bu dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo myi mang pos gang ba dang / bapyod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang
210b1(1): 'khrug pa dang gakha nang khrug dang / chom rkun dang / mu ke dang / nad rnams myed pa dang / 'bras sa ku dang / ba lang dang / ma gau dang ldan par 'dug te// chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// 
210b2(1): de'i phyi bzhin blon po khri brgyad stod gyis zham 'bring byas te/ skyed mos 'tshal gyi shing rnams me tog brgyas la rang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / sheng shang de'u rnams skad byi nad pa'i nags
210b3(1): khrod du sod pa las/ des skyed mos tshal der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong nas des de la zla ba gsum gyi bar tu phan pa'i zas kyis snyen skur byas so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang / de'i sku
210b4(1): gdur gyi mchod rten thigs nas blon po'i tshigs dang bcas pa til mar gyis skus te/ des na kho ra da dang bcas pa/ chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur da to// gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srung gyi ribal rab tu byung ste
210b5(1): des der dbang po yongs su sbyinang par byas pa des na/ da ltar dag pa com pa nyid mngon gsum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par sbyind pa yang
210b6(1): dge slong dag de bas na/ las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu des lam dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la brtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar srab par bya'o// 
210b7(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal dpa// dge slong dag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / bzeng ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
210b8(1): ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / pho brang kho da kyi myi rnams dang / tshong pon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rnams dang/ 
210b9(1): lA ma yin rnams dang / nam khas lding rnams dang / myi 'am ci dang lho phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ lha dang g+hu dang / gnod sbyin dang / snga ma yin dang / nam ka hIng dang / 
211a1(1): kyi'am ci dpa pa go bye ched po rnams kyis mchon cing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dab/ zhem zas dang / gzibs pa dang / gdan dang / srun pa mos dang / 
211a2(1): spang zong rnams bsnyes pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyand tu yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed pas sbyin gyi kun dga'ar ba na bzhugs so de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs
211a3(1): rgyas nas/ so bcu gnyis lon te/ lo bcu gnyis 'das nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su byond pa de'i tshe bro ba 'i 'alo zas dang bdud rtsi'i zas las gsogs bshag kya stong phrag tu mas bden pa mthong ba ste// rgyas
211a4(1): zas cang ni rtogs so// de nas rgyal po zas tsang gyis sras kyi legs pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas de'i blo skyes pa gal te bdag gyi bu rab tu ma 'byung tu 'dzin na ni 'di'i khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i mtha' bzhir
211a5(1): rgyas pa tshogs dang bcas pa chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ra pa byung du gzhug gor ma cag snyam mo zhig na ni zor tsugs can rab tu 'byung na ste g.yog byas pa ni rab tu myi mdzes kyis bdag gyis shag kya las khyim re nas myi de rab
211a6(1): tu 'byung du zhe / gor ma chag snyam mo/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gyis/ shag kya thams cad sdu ba'i phyir/ grong khyer du dril sgrags so// / de nas shag kya thams cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas thang byis
211a7(1): smras pa/ kyo shag kya khyed rnams nyon cig/ gas te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung du zin na dang / khyed kho nas 'di la snyen skubya rkos na ni rab tu 'byung gyis/ shag kya khyim myi re re snyen bkur
211a8(1): bya ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes byas so// de nas bzang ldan dang ma gags pa dang / nas gru dang / zhwa sbyin las ba sogs pa shag+sa kya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu byung bar bcas so// de nas de dag kyi rigs mkhan sbyin su
211a9(1): byed pa nye bar khror da ces nges rab tu byeng bangang mtho nas ngu/ de nas shag kya rnams kyis nye ba 'khor nga ci'i phyis ru zhes dris so// de nas des snying rje rje skad zems sug sug skad zer la sI zhing sme ste/ khyod rab tu bya/ 
211a10(1): na bdag kha zas dang / gos kyis skyong ba su zhig mchis/ de nas shag kya rnams kyis smras pa ste/ ba pa 'khora'i na rgyas/ thing shig ces byas so// de nas des ngas bting nas sha ka kya rnams kyis lus la gre rgas pa'i
211b1(1): do shal da / si mo do dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang na bye du n+ya dang / dpur rgyan dang / sor thub rnams phung por spungs s+ya te byin ne 9/ dregs khan nye bar 'khor ba de dag kyang rab tu byung ba de mthong la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la yang ltas/ 
211b2(1): nanas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa skyes te/ sho ga kya 'di dag ni chos rigs dang byad gzugs dang / yang mtshe' dang 'byodad pa dang ldan pa yin na/ 'on kyang btsun mo rna rnams dang / rgyan 'di dag mchil ma bzhin du bor nas rab tu 'byung
211b3(1): na bdag ci yang myi 'dog pa zhig gyis rgyan 'di dag khyim du bkur dri ni ci 'dod de/ 'di dag btang la bdag kyang 'di dag gyi rjes su rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas/ dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
211b4(1): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag lta bu yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul pa la rab tu 'byung mchis na
211b5(1): rab tu 'byung ba dang / snyend par rdzogs shing dge slong phyi dngos po thob tu ru de/ na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa 'apyad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog
211b6(1): nye bar 'khor gyi do shes nas/ chos rigs dang / byang zugs dang / 'byoradad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal tu ma btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la bka' bsal dpa bzang ldan gang gyi
211b7(1): phyir nga'i phyir bston pa 'di la ni cho rigs dang byad gzugs dpal chos dang dbang phyug dang / rigs bzhi rnam par dag pa dang / sbyar ba myed kyis 'di la phyag 'tshol cig/ de nas bzang ldan las srogs pa zhag kya lnga brgyas/ 
211b8(1): chos nyid brtsam par byas nas// sdong po ma ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag byas so// de dag gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i mod la/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas der tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis/

212a1(1): ga/ chos can yin par zad chod dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa kham sum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur sa nas /  gseng dang mi
212a2(1): bar mnyam pa dang / rab mkha' dang lag thil tu 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan kha / btsan dan pa spangs pa sa bur gsil bar gyur da pa/ ma rig pa sgo ba'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa
212a3(1): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang ma chags pa dang // bkur sti la myi lta ba/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i mchog tu gyur da to// de yang bdag nyid che ba dang stug cing 'phongs

212a9(1): khyod lam zhi bas bsod snyoms blangs te/ rigs ngan gyi khyim nas slar byung ba de la bdag 'di snyam du sems so// bcom/ ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni shi na tu dul bgyid pa'o// de la rten nas 'di lta bur skyid bdel rab mchisas
212b1(1): bde' bas skyed pa dag kyang 'di ltar rtul dor bar gyu da pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal baM ska l-i daM pa/ rgyal po chen po bzang ldan 'di la mi ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yod kyis nyon cig rgyal po

212b10(1): khye bzhig mthong ngo // de nas smra po des khum par 'dod pa'i phyir bu mo de bsnyams nad kyis khung ba zhig phrogs nas pam chun tu bros so// bu mo 'di yang me bzhin 'brang bzhin no// de nas snar po des chum chom myed par

213a3(1): sbal dang bdos te/ rang sangs rgyas la khur ba de phul lo// de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i dges bya skyed pa'i phyir dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma rgyangs pa bzhin su nam ma khal la mngon par 'phags so// cho 'phru la rnam pas

214b11(1): na ci rung gyis yang dad pa kha yi dad khas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung du gsol cig/ gal te rab tu 'byung ba la/ dga' bar gyur da na ni bsngon po mchis na khyed kyis gzigs pa'i 'gyur gra gal te dga'

215a3(1): kyis gyi nang mod kyi gal te rab tu 'byung ba'i 'og tu 'o na ni gdod gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong gyis spras pa/ kye phrad par bgyi'o// de nas khyim bdag gyi bu yul 'khor skyong khad kyis lus kyis/ bstobs skyed nas

219b2(1): dga' mabum myod do// ze zhing dka' la dga' makun spyod pa las mangs na bu snga ma de 'dug pazhir tu re shig ma ma'i gor de'i bu snga phyir bcu byung yang bu dang po de ni sa nyid ma 'dug bzhin no// so nas re shig na khyim bdag kyi chung ma ren

219b7(1): kun dgal po song la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das cu khrod tu zhi gshegs par mas bzhed kyis khyed las gang ma du 'byung ba ga/ 'de pa de dag geg shig ces sgo zhes/ 3/ de nas me ni ka na bcos nas nas/ de dang ldan 'aku zhes

220a5(1): gyur pa to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bkra' bas/ sad pa/ dge slong dag 'di snyam srid pa/ tha ma'i sems can gyis kyang nyams su 'di ralta bu myong bar gyur kyis srid pa skye ba thams cad kyis mchog par

223b1(1): thams can 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams shes bya'o// de nas me dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong lnga brgya po rnams kyis bshad pa yi mngon par sod de/ rjes su yid rangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba ste/ phyi nang nas bcom
223b2(1): ldan 'das kyi zha bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu khod do// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces gsold to// btsun pa dge slong 'gon pa na gnas pa dang / shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas
223b3(1): pas chos gang dag rgyan myi chad par yid la bgyi// dga' bo dge slong 'gon pa na gnas pa dang // shing drung na gnas pa dang / khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis rgyun myi chad par yid la bya ste/ zhi gdas dang lhag mthong ngo // btsun pa zhi gnas
223b4(1): kun tu rten cing sgoms te/ mang du bgyis pas dom gang dge nyams su myong bar bgyis lags/ lhag mthong kund tu rtend cing sgoms te/ mang du bgyis pas don gang nyams su myong bar gyur da lags/ lhag mthong kun tu rten cing sgoms te/

223b6(1): sgoms pa'i bkas pa nyan thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi sgo nas te/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//  btsus pa khams rnams gang dag lags // kun dgal po stong ba'i khams gang yid pa dang / 'dod chags das brang
223b7(1): pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o// btsun pa gang dag spangs pa la spong ba'i khams shes bgyi// gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams shes bgyi
223b8(1): kang 'gog pa la 'gog pa'i khams shes bgyikun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams shes bya'o/ 'du byed thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang / brel ba'i khams shes bya'o// 'du byed
223b9(1): thams cad las 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams shes bya'o// btsun pa bstond pa dang nyan thos rnams 'di ste/ tshig gi mchog gyis 'di kho na ltar don tu mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / tshig dang tshig tu mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / yi ge dang
223b10(1): yi gen mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / mdo mtshang lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa 'dis bdag gnas rta mgon po ga la ba der mchis nas gnas rten dge slong rgan po la don 'di nyid tshig 'di nyid rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams mas na yang
224a1(1): bya da ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skang bkal bar byal pa/ kho na bzhin du bdag la don 'di nyid tshig rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams kyis mas pa'i lan btab la/ bdag dge slong gnas rta rgan pos bshad pa la mdzen
224a2(1): bar bsod de/ rjes su yid rang nas dge slong lnga brgya po rnams ga la ba der mchis te/ dge slong lnga brgya po rnams la don 'di nyid tshig 'di nyid rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams kyis rnams na yang da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ci skad
224a3(1): bka' ba la la ba/ kho ma bzhin du de dag kyis kyang bdag la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang / yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras pa yi lan btab le/ btsun pa sod pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'di ste/ tshig gi mchog gyis 'di kho na khur don dang / 
224a4(1): don tu mthun zhing 'dra la tshig tu mthun zhing 'dra ba dang / yi ge dang yi ger mthum zhing 'dra ba de ni ngo mtshan lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bu la dpeH/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong rgan mo su yin shes sam/ gsong dpa
224a5(1): btsun pa dag slong rgan po ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zag pa/ bya ba byas pa/  khyer bor ba rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yong na/  su zad pa// sang dag pa'i shes pas sems shinan tu rnam par grol sa sa sa so
224a6(1): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa// byed pa byas pa/ khyun pong la/ rab kyi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor da la yongs zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes
224a7(1): bas sems shims tu rnam pa mgrol pa sha stag lags so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das dang / rtse dang pa kun dga' bos/ dge slong rgan mo dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag glengs shing sgrags pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the com
224a8(1): skyes te /  be tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgan zhes las gang dag bgyis na / mo drug bcu'i bar tu ma'i mangs na mchis par gyur nga lags// bsus pa las gang dag bgyis na
224a9(1): des yid 'dul pa 'gyur da lag rab tu sa bya nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngos gsum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba kra sad pa// dge slong rgan po 'di nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gnan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing snyen sgrub
224a10(1): pa dang ldan terabal rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon myi zas par 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pas na rgan pos 'di nyid kyis las bsags pa de dag nas su zhig gyis nyams su myong bar gyur da te/ dge slong dag las byas shing

224b4(1): grang ste 'anings 'i grong dul kyi gro byed pa bku kyi ces byas so// da/ gnas can gyis smras pa/ tu dkyang 'gas kyim gan songs terked pa'i phyogs gis gis san gnyis pa gsum gyi bar du dge slong ba'o/

224b6(1): dge slong gzho nu lho bdun can des ngag gyi las grub mo spras te/ khyod lo drug bcu'i bar du yang khyim nas ma 'byung shig/ nga ni song zin no zhes byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsul pa dge slong dag
224b7(1): ci stal tu sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong gzho zhung gyu nga pa gang yim pa de ni dge slong gno mu 'di yin te/ des dadagra bcom pa la zhe sdang byas nas ngag gyi las rtsul mo sbas pa de'i las kyi rnam par sbyin
224b8(1): bas lo drug bcu'i bar bya ma'i lton 'dug pa 'dug go gzhan yang chos la ser sa byas pas ni shes rab 'chal par gyur da te/ dbang po rnams tshegs chen yongs su spyings par byung ngo to// de nas der srabs pa dang / 
224b9(1): kha don byas pa dang / phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa / des mid
225a1(1): dam pa'i kyis dug pa'i nyes pa des bu dag kyi byung bya'o// de nyid kyis dasu 'artsog pa yon tan kyi tshogs des bun thob par bya te/ dge slong khyed kyis de yang slab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gad ces bka' bas 'dadas/ 
225a2(1): den slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngod par sod do// / lag pa can zhes bya ba ni sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyas go rnams dang 'ablon mo chen po rnams dang 'phyag po rnams da
225a3(1): mo phrang rdzodas kyi lci rnams dang / tshod dpon rnams dpa /  de 'apon rnams dang / zhwa rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / ska ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / khyi las gyi rnams dang / sa bye chen po rnams kyis
225a4(1): sum gi byas pa tha mar bya sa mi tho byas mchod par byas te/ lda dang bu dang / dod sbyin dang / rnam yin dang nas mkhag rdzing dang / rtsibs ci / rnams dang / rko kye ched po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i yangs rgyas can

225a6(1): rgyal byed kyi tshab khyim bdag mgon myed zas sprin gyi kun dag lar ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyen tu yod pa na tshong mon phyag cing nor sa nga la g.yong spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan par/

225a8(1): zla ba brgyad dam dgu son pa dang bu 'byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing ltan stug la mdzes pa 'dog ser gyi gdog can yas lag dang nyin lag dang ldan pa/  rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so// de nas rjes rang gyi lag pa gnyis
225a9(1): bzung ste/ 'o byed cing 'tha la brjob par byed cing // byud par byed de// tshig tu smras pa/ kyes bdag gyi lag gu gnyis shind tu yum ring mo zhig nas 'dod rnyed do// kyem bdag gyi lag gyis shi nang tu ming mo zhim nas bdod rnyed do zhes zer
225b1(1): de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mying ci skad btags shes mying 'dogs par byed de / nyi du rnams na re 'di bces ma thag tu lag gzung ste/ yo byed cing zang la 'jod la khyad par byed pas ma/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di 'i/ 
225b2(1): mying lag ba can zhes btags so// kazhes zer ro// de nas khye'u lag pa can pa na tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang / nu ma sbun pa'i lam gnyis dang / dris 'khrud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ mam brgyad la rtad nas
225b3(1): demam brgyad kyi 'o ma dang mar dang / zho dang / zhur ma ma dang / mang gi nyin khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po mchog gyis skyed srings te/ mtshol nam gyi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur ro// de nas gang gyi tshe yul der
225b4(1): gajigs pa zhig byung ba de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs 'jigs par gyur pa te// phan tshun ci bya tol myed nas ka rdzos rnams sbed par byed do// khye'u lag pa cam ni lag pa gnyis sbeng bar byed do// skye bo'i tshogs pa yang 'di skad du/ 
225b5(1): kyi bo na gnas rnams sa sem pa snga la bamam khyed cig/ tshig rtsub mo ma zeracig/ kye bdag gyi lag gu gnyis shin tu yum ring mo zhis nas 'dod rnyed cwa dro zhes zer ro// de nas phyi zhig ra khye'u la ga pa can rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
225b6(1): tshal du song ba dang / de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sgra skyes bu medapo'i ma ma gsum bcu la gnyis kyis legs pang brgyan la/ dpe' byang bzang po brgyad 'acus mdzes par byal pa/ yod 'dos gang kyis rba
225b7(1): brgyan pa la/ nyi ma song bas ldag pa'i 'odan yangal pa/ rin po che'i ji 'gro ba lta bu kun nas mdzes pa mthong nas// mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba gyu t+ye kra/ dbra' ba skyed dus bcom ldan
225b8(1): ljin dang can tshwas bya masanan pa byed/ lom ldan 'das kyi spya pa tun no//  bcos ldan 'das kyis da ga ta drang / babs da nga bzhis 'as ba cas chen
225b9(1): yin pa dpa rgya pa na dum lam kyi/ de chos sa ga ra gyi brjod pa chogs ni ra ri se mtsha gres shes rje nges ma rna pazhegs pa'i tha pa pos pa

228a7(1): da kyi rnam par sbyi na pas khyim der zab mo chen po 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsogs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir zab mo 'byung ngo bsnyam mo/ de nas phyi ma mog tu

228a9(1): myi khyen tam pa de nas gnas has na/ ti'i bus de'i nyin par mdun tu bcug ste/ khyim de'i nang du song nas dge 'dun gyi khrod du 'dug nas/ yang yongs su ni kha zas brims nas/ de la ni brim pa'i myis ni rjed nas

228b1(1): 'di nyid tu 'dug shig dang / bdag gyis khyed kyi zas khyer te/ 'ongs zhes labyas so// / kan se tan tAn dka' bo ni bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi phung po brgyang khri spobs pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag las nyi khri sogs te re
228b2(1): @bu'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin na/ de gus gsogs kyi las kyi sgrib pas gnas rten kun dga' bos kyang rjed par gyur da te/ der yang lan gsum spyad par gyur te// de nas zhag zhi lon pa'i rje/ gnas nyan kun dga' bo sa sgoms te
228b3(1): bstod snyoms byed na/ de yang phyir 'gro ba'i khyim rnams kyis phrogs// der yang de lan bzhi spyad par gyur da to// de nas zhag lnga lon pa'i tshe gnas brtan mya'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos thos nas/ 'de gus gsogs kyi phyir bsod
228b4(1): snyoms blangs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / da gus gsogs kyis las kyi rnam par spyi nang pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gyis 'dra ba lug gyis bsdu nang nas rgya mtsho'i nang du bor te/ der yang de lane lnga spyang bar gyu da te/ 
228b5(1): de nas zhag drug lon pa'i tshe gnas rtan sha ri'i bus thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag kho nas 'di gus bsod/ bsnyoms blang gor ma chag snyam mo// de nis gnas rtan sha ri'i bus de'i gsod smos
228b6(1): blings nas khyis de nyid du myi snang bar byas so// de gus gsogs kyi gnas khang na no 'ongs so// sen pa 'i zhus pa sogs rgyan mas kyi rnam par sbyin pas sgo delam phrag kyis skor ba par gyur / 
228b7(1): de nas gnas rten sha ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis phyung nas zas de khar 'jug go/ snyam ste zas khang bcug na/ de'i las kyi rnam par spyi nad bsla myed par phyin la pos 'gyurar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de gus gsogs
228b8(1): khaskal ba myed par shes nas skyo bar 'gyurd nas/ der yang btsun pa de lan drug spyid par gyur pa to// de nas zhag bdun pa'i nyin par tshe dang ldan pa de gus gsogs kyis/ sems can rnams skyo ba skyes pa dang / las rnams chu
228b9(1): myi za' ba stonapa pa dang / las kyi stobs brang ba'i phyir lhung zod thal bas bkang ste/ sangs rgyas las gsogs pa/ dge slong gyi dgel 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas chu dang sgrogs de zhungs nas// grub po ldag ma myed pa'i
228b10(1): mya ngan las 'das pa'i byings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa so// de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas skyo bar gyur te// de sku gdung la sku gdung gyi mchod pa byas so// de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes
229a1(1): Ni / the cos thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa de gus gsogs kyis las gang dag bgyis der dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa 'am lan drug spyang par gyur nas zhag bdun par/ 
229a2(1): brdugs la phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i byings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsal pa// dge slong dag 'di gus gsogs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu
229a3(1): tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon myi zal bar 'dod pa'i 'od pa'i las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zi nad pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par
229a4(1): sbyind par gyur ro// lus can dag kyi las rnams ni/ bskal pa rgyar yang chud myi zal// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du sbyin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer ba na sem
229a5(1): khyim bdag cig kyi rlung ma dad pa dang / dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig 'dug bu de rgyun myi chang par dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang bkren pa dang / 'dug cing 'phongs pa dang / slong ba rnams la sbyin pa dag byed do// 
229a6(1): phyis de'i khyim thab shi nas re shig na de'i bu bdag gyi bdag khor gyur to// / de yang ser N+Das gzhungs pa yo byad la kun tu 'dzind pa// khrel yang tor ma myi ster ba zhig ste// de dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i dang / 
229a7(1): bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / spong ba rnams mthong na sems sbeng bar byed do// de'i ma ni sngon gyi khyags bzhi mdu/ dge slong dang / zlum zo' dang / bkren pa dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / slob pa rnams la/ 
229a8(1): sbyin dang / sbyin pa dag byin na/ de nas de'i bu sor sA gnod pa des smras pa/ yum bdag ma dad kyis/ sbyin pa dag ma byed ci ga des smras pa bu cig khyim 'di ni khyim gyi lugs 'di yin no// de nas des logs cig tu zam phogs
229a9(1): gzhag mtshon kyang zan gyi phyed ni sbyin par byed do// phyed mi bdag nyid za'o// de nas seng sngas gnod cing khros pas bsgribs pa de'i blo can nges lang dang yang du bkag te/ thabs cig bus kag kyang bezhag ma nus nas/ ma la
229a10(1): smras pa/ yum gyi bzhig chis kyis khyim gyis phug tu bzhud cig/ de nas rang bzhin gyis drang ba khyim phyag tu song ngo // de nas de sgo bcad de nyi ma gcig zen bcad nas des smras pa/ bu bdag bkres so// de nas des tshig rtsub
229a11(1): oM smras te/ mal ba la bsgoms shig ces byas so de nas re shig mnyam bya zhing myi bde' la dong ba dang phrang ba / des/ snying rje rje skad du khrus btab kyang zhag drug kyi bar du spyar du gtsug se ma btang nas shi'o// 'on tan ser sngas spabs
229b1(1): pa de ma dang bral ba la bskyod myed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pasaH/ dge slong dag ci snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus ma khyim bdag kyi bur gyu nga pa gang yin pa de ni 'de gus gsogs 'di yin tes gdes la la gnod
229b2(1): babyas pa'i rnam par smin pa nges bskal pa cin gyi kha'adu sems can dmyal ba chen po nas mnapa skyed pa de skyes so// rgya de kho nas de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas nas spyod par gyur te thal ba zos nas/ yongs su rgya
229b3(1): las 'das so// dge slong dag dgel 'di gus sogs kyis las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags pa ste/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na gros khyer pa mas na bram ze'i lnga la te nad pa ba ma gas gnas pa'i bram/ 
229b4(1): zel dang / khyim bdag skye bo thams cad kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang / bla bar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod cing bkur ba dag yod do// chos nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang sangs rgyas
229b5(1): sug cing 'phongs pa rnams la snying rtse bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis ga chol ba'i 'jig rten gyi g.yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten na 'byung ste/ re shig na spangs rgyas gcig cig pa pan ser bsod snyoms
229b6(1): la so ba dang / de de lag yang bkang srung zed kyang bkang swe/ phyira'abyung ba bram ze de thong nas/ deng sengs skyes te/ srung zeng / da / gas tshu gog ces byas so// nyin thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams/ narbad+ha
229b7(1): ni ma bsams par shes pa myi 'jug ste/ btsun pa nges bstand to// de nas des sa la pho nas rkang pas rnal lo// de nas rang sangs rgyas de sbyang bar 'dug kyang bram ze de bgyod pa bam skyes so// dge slong
229b8(1): dag ci snyam du sems de'i de'i dus ma bram zer gyu dad pa kung yin pa 'de gus bsogs/ 'di yin no// gzhams pa bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gyi ring la rab tu 'byung ste/ des der 'tshangs par myong ba'i gnas
229b9(1): srungs pa des na/ dastan dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na/ las cig tu nges 'du gnag pa rnams ni/ rnam par sbyind pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// 
229b10(1): las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par sbyind pa yang des dkar par 'gyur ro// las 'dren mi rnam par sbyin pa pa ya 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slo pa dag de khas a las cig tu nges par
230a1(1): / gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las cig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig btang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar slab par bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad cem bka' stsa lad/ 
230a2(1): nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par spyod do// / 'khor ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen
230a3(1): po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang / long brang khongs kyi myi rnams dang // tshong dpon rnams dang / deng khron rnams dang / sku rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang
230a4(1): gyi 'am ci rnams dang / sto phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byis/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas// mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po rnams
230a5(1): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'basod nams chen po// dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun sos dang / sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi
230a6(1): dge 'dun dang bcas pa// mnyan tu yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha khyi ma bdag mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga'ar ba ma bzhugs so// // de'i tshe mnyan tu yod pa na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la long/ na d+ya Sh+Ta
230a7(1): khyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi zhwa'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
230a8(1): dga' mgur spyod pa las/ nga nang dga' la dga' mgur spyad pa las/ chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu son pa dang / bu 'byung se khye'u gzugs bzang zhing se na sdug pa yan sag dang nyin lag thams cad dang

230a10(1): de bcas pa'i bcas pa ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mying ji skad bdags shes mying 'dogs par byed de// nye tu rnams mame 'di btsas ma thag tu 'khor ba 'khor zhes sgrogs pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i mying 'khor pa zhes btag sa/ 
230b1(1): zhes zer // de nas khye'u 'khor ba bA na mtho ba'i mam gnyis dang / nu ma spun pa'i mam gnyis dang / dri ma 'khrud pa'i sam gnyis dang / rtse ba'i mam gnyis te mam brgyad wa ta nas// de mas brgya
230b2(1): kyi rlo ma dang / zho dang / zhun mer dang / mar gyi nyid khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo mchog gyis skyed srings te/ tshe'i nang gyi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de nas de mthar kyis cher skyes pa dang / 
230b3(1): de dang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran nas skye bo'i tshigs bstand te/ kye bra ma rnams dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams lnga rtsub mo ma zer cig/ 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal pa'o zhes zer ro// de nas phyis re shig na
230b4(1): phan 'tshun du khyim du song ba las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mtshal du phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rgya nad pa// dpel byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par

231a8(1): bar 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon 'byung 'i 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa

231a10(1): na se na drang srong rtswa'i ri dgas na rten cing / bzhugs so// de'i tshe grong khyer ba lan se na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas rten zhig la rab tu 'byung ngo // gnas rten de ni dgra bcom pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig go// de nas re
231b1(1): de ci'i tshu gas bya ma shin du ngas gdas sbed pa rnangs pa tshad bu bzod byed du ba ni 'i ni sa byas so // gnas can kyis rnam pa 'i gdung 'das kyi pa mongs des bas phyog ma rtsog
231b2(1): 'brus kyi ba tu ge slong gan des gnas ston panings pakhyod dus kyi gro byer tu btsu ces byas nas bang yam gnyis pan gsus kyi bar duganas can kyigyis bu tung sngags kyis songs des pa rgya

232a4(1): spyan drangs te/ sul sbo ma can gyi skye bo mang po gtul bar bya ba rnams dang par mdzad pa/ de de'i tshe yul slong mtshan pa'i tshogs thams cad sangs rgyas la zhomang/ chos la khab te/ dge' 'dun la 'bab ste/ dang do de che du
232a5(1): sbo ma can na khyim bdag phyag cing nor mngal longs khyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba garnam thos kyi bu'i rdo dang 'gran la zhi ga gnas pa des// rigs mnyam kha las chung ma blangs nas

232a8(1): bal 'byung ngo // de nas de'i phas dbadra phyag gyi stobs kyi shugs kyis nor dang sngags dang / sman dang g.yog dang ldan pa dag nyid kyis/ sos ma 'on kyang las kyi stobs kyi shugs thob 'as mnad de zhi bar ma gyur
232a9(1): lus cad thams cad de lta bur gyur nas/ do sa se chos kyis spyod par byed nas de'i mying 'tshed pa zhes byas so// de nas re shig na khye'u sbed pa cher skyes nas/ de'i glibs po ma zlal rnams mnyan tu yong ba'i
232a10(1): grong khyer slob ma can tu dong dong de dag gyis de'i pha ma la smras pa/ yab gal te mnyand tu yod par khrid ma/ de sma dad pa dang / sman las gsos pa mtshos te/ mos nas nad de gso nus so zhes byas so// de nas de'i phas
232b1(1): tshig ga di mnyan nas rin po me ma po dngagaso rnams sbyin rje mnyan tu song bar btang nas de bar kyis grogs po sa bla nams dang / mnyan tu song par gyi nang nas de sman pa dang / rnyong dang / sman dang / gsog kyang can
232b2(1): tu yod kyi/ de'i las skyes pa'i nad de gso' ma nus so// de nas phyis re shig ma/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal tu song nas/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtsham gsum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis

232b5(1): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dpa pags nyal dang / khams dpa dra bzhi nazhugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pa ni rdzogs byam gyur ba'i// de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas nye bar len
232b6(1): po'i phung tho da dang / mchos byin rab/ gzug du dang / zhig pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rtogs te 'du byed thams cad sbyig ga shing rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams ca bcam
232b7(1): rnam pa dang / nga ba dang / rnam pa thong ba dang / rnam par 'jig ses chos can mim pa sung cod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa
232b8(1): khams sum pa'i 'dod chags dang bras gyur du nas/ gserd dang thong b.ramanyas pa/ nam mkha' dang lag bis du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ btsan dan spangs pas bum bsil bar gyu nga ba// rig pas sgom
232b9(1): 'i zhabs bcom pa// rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mo so yang dag par rims thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / bkur sil gyi lta ba dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / bcas pa'i sgra rnams kyis
232b10(1): mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus yang sba ba'i gnas su gyur to// de'i grogs po zla de dag kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis rab tu 'byung ba de dag nyid kyis rab tu 'byung nas de dag/ tshe dang ldan pa sred pa ga la ba de dadzod
233a1(1): ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sred pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sred pa 'jig rten na 'jigs pa'i chos can ni gang yin/ 'jig rten na 'jigs pa'i chos can yin pa ni gang
233a2(1): yin/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gzugs 'jig pa'i chos can yin no// de 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

233a4(1): mim/ tshe dang lda ba sbed pa der gyi ting pa mi ri/ rje dang lan pa ci rtag pa gang zin pa de sdug bsdus pa yin nas/ 'on tu sug bsal pa ma yi satshe dang ldan pa med pa de mug bsngas pa yid do// me dang ldan pa gyi tad pa dang
233a5(1): sdug bslab pa dang / rnam par 'gyur pa'i chos can yin pa sa zad chod de/  gang yin pa de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i phags pa nyan thos 'di lan tu 'di ni bdag kyiso// 'dis bdag byin na / 'di ni bdag kyi
233a6(1): byadag me nga/ bangag tu 'dzidad par 'gyur dam/ me dang rnam pa pa ni yin no// mo nga lan pa 'dag mi snyas du semasadang / 'atsug pa dang / 'ang byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa @#
233a7(1): yi mnam pa yod te gyi rtag pa yin tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni myi rtag pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag kyi rtag pa ga pa yin pa de sug bsngamal pa yi ma nas/ 'on rtse kun bsal pa ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa
233a8(1): de ni mug bsngal pa yin no// me sa ldan pa dag kyi chag pa dang / sug bsngal ba dang / rnam par 'byung ba'i chos can gang yin pa de dag la thos pa dang / ldad pa'i 'phags pa nyam thongs/ 'di khyim tu 'dini 'das/ 
233a9(1): gyi'o// 'di ni bdag ma yin no snyam du bdag tu 'dzind par 'gyur ram// tshe dang ldan pa de ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag de bas na// gzugs ci yang myed par 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa deng / da ltar 'byung ba
233a10(1): 'am gyi 'om bas pa nang ngam 'gas pa 'am/ 'phrab 'am/ bzlab po 'asu/ lag ring ba 'am/ nye ba'am yang rung ste / de dag thams kyi 'di ba dag kyi ba yin no// sapa byed gang seng dag pacoM la ba gni
233b1(1): shes rab kyis lta bar bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ci yang rung pa dang / rnam par shes pa ci yang rung ba 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / na dam phyi rol lam/ rags pa 'am
233b2(1): cha pra ba dang ma/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang po 'am/ zag ring lam nye ba ya bdung ste// de dag thams cad la ni bdag gi ma yin no// 'di ni ya ga phyi ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gyi bdag ma yin no// snyam du yang dag

292b2(1): bram ze chos rnams kyi// pha rol du phyind pani 'gyur pa na// de tshe de'i sa mthong ba na// rkyen rnams thams cad nub par 'gyur/ gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi// pha ro lad phyi nad par gyur da pa na// de tshe de nis mthong bas ni
292b3(1): kun sbyor thams cad nub par 'gyur ba gang che bras ze chos rnams kyis/ pha ro bad phyind par gyudad pa na de ci spyi dang sa ba dang / da ma me ba rnams las gin 'das/ gnyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ satsa po
292b4(1): ba snang bar byed/ rgyal rigs mgo' nas chags pas gsapa bram theb sems par byed na gsal/ nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ sa nyam rang mo zla ba sdang byed ltar/ rtag tu sangs rgyas zi brjid can/ 
292b5(1): nyin dang mtshan du gsal bar byed// ji ltar myi sdug pa las yid logapa// de 'dra'i bram ze rnams la// cung zad myed ci lta/ ji ltar/ 5de'i yid ldog pa/ de ltar kun rdzob bden par zad
292b6(1): che bram ze brtson pas sems pas na// gang kyis chos rnams rgyung ba ces rab shes pa// chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur da te/ do che de'i sa som nyi ma lus spong / gdu tshe bram ze tshon par
292b7(1): sems dpa' na/ kar gyis sdug pa sa/ tshur bcas rab shes pa/ chos rnams la// rab tu kyang te// de'i tshe de'i oM nyi la lus spos ga tshe bram ze brtson pas sems na// gas kyis tshor pa
292b8(1): zad parag mtho gyur dpa/ chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ de de'i sa/ som nyi ma lus spod// gang che bram ze brtson pas/ sems pa sa gang gyis rkyen rnams// zad par thob par 'gyur dag/ chos rnams
292b9(1): 'di ga garab tu 'byung gyur ba te gshe che de'i sa som nyi ma lus dos gag che bam ze brtso par sems dpal na/ gang kyis labablad pa thos par 'gyur/ chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te/ de ngo'isu mo sa
293a1(1): khab sems pas mamagun byed byis pas nas 'thob 'ang/ 'dud kyi sernams com nas 'anas gyu dad pa cos pade rnams pa rab sakyang/ gatham mo'i sgoms te gsum bcul gsub so/
